author: 1a560981043455fd9c213560b851abe1
content:
In short, Persona 5 Strikers is a wonderful game with a nice history, amazing voice actors and soundtrack, fun gameplay and beautiful graphics. I absolute recommend this game.

Full review bellow, may cointain spoilers, I dont know.

I really loved Persona 5 Strikers, not only it brought back our dear Phantom Thieves together filling that void that you get when your favorite game or show ends but it also delivered an amazing history and game.

History

I really enjoyed the history, usually Persona games are really straight foward, the bad guys are evil, the good guys bring them down, nothing wrong with that, however, in Persona 5 Strikers most of the villains arent actually evil people and its really good to see such shift from an abusive professor that beats middle schoolers and abuse them to an artist and singer consumed by sadness and sorrow doing some wrong things after obtaining an unknown power through Emma that could help them in running away from scars from the past.

Not only it gave the gang a weird feeling after beating the shadow form of the villains, but they also felt so connected to the problems they were facing. Instead of having the usual hero vs villain fight to save the people, our dear Phantom Thieves wanted to help the villains aswell, since they were good people too! It was so nice to see that people could forgive people like Natsume cherishing his comeback or Mariko listening to the mother that lost his daughter saying that Mariko was really important to the city and wanted her as mayor again.

We're living times were people define you for mistakes you commited, you see on Social Media people absolutely terrorizing famous people lifes for errors they did 2? 6? years ago, ignoring that despite being famous they're humans aswell, imperfect and capable of changing. People do it to everyone nowadays, one mistake and your life is ruined.
So Persona 5 Strikers history brings a really important message, that not everyone that do mistakes are evil people, that people despite doing wrong things wether you forgive them or not CAN change. I really liked it, it is really important to have themes like this delivered to us.

I really liked Sophia and Zenkichi, both were such well developed characters. Despite having the means to have an extensive knowledge, Zenkichi being a grown adult working for PubSec and Sophia an AI with full acess to information, both had such low knowledge of emotions and spent the whole journey learning. It was so warming to see Zenkichi coming to therms with Akane and finally facing Owada, thus, becoming a good father and a good friend to himself, no longer running away from his ideals and goals. Sophia, even though she is an AI, displayed so many emotions, everytime she interfered and spoke to villains, showing her views and ideas about what was going on, I could imagine her crying if she could, for an AI she has so much passion, its like even though she doesnt have a physical heart, it is there. She became a caring and loving friend, a true humanity companion :)

It was also nice to see how much Makoto and Haru matured, while Ryuji and Ann are still teenagers slacking their duties on school hahaha

Gameplay

I enjoyed so much the way Atlus introduced Persona to hack n slash, it was really well done. Battling felt so satisfying with such beautiful graphics and soundtrack, the voice acting is top notch. Every character had an unique way of attacking and the way baton pass works in P5S was really well done.
Despite having so much fun, there are things I believe it could be done diferently.

Since the battles are so action packed and fast, having an image show every time you attack the enemy weakness not only becomes a visual polution but it also decrease the value that it had on previous Persona Games. It is so satisfying to see an image pop up with a close face of your character when you crit in Persona 4, it didnt feel that satisfying having the close up every time you attack the enemy weakness, sometimes it felt like it was delaying the battle and I know I just felt this way because the image showed every time. The close-up face image should only show sometimes, I suppose in future hack'n'slash games, Persona magic abilities could crit too and therefore the image would only show if the ability landed a crit? I dont know.

I am grateful that the commands arent a mess for keyboard users, I had no problem playing this game on keyboard and could enjoy it's full experience despite not having a controller. I dont think its a flaw, its just an opinion, but, I wish they changed the default key for guns, it felt weird to use ctrl key + shift for charged shots and sometimes I accidentaly pressed the windows key, also, it was difficult to leave the Gun mode when using Sophia due to the keys being so far away. Maybe its a problem in my end, who knows.

Soundtrack + Voice Acting

Amazing as always, Persona games always deliver good music and this game is no exception! The new versions of musics used in Persona 5/Persona 5 Royal are REALLY good, I couldnt image that such good tracks could be improved since they were already good, but they improved them a lot to fit this game! Keeper of Lust in Persona 5 Strikers is such a banger, congratulations!
Also, thanks Atlus for possibility of choosing old Persona games battle musics, it was such cool addition, I really loved it.

The voice actings was perfect! There were so many emotional moments that would NEVER be as good as they are if the dub wasnt so well done! Yusuke telling Natsume to dont lump Sayuri with the soulless history that he wrote, Sophia and Ichinose/Konoe, Ryuji telling Emma to shut up when she was telling bad things to Sophia. So many good moments.

Ahh I feel like playing again just by remembering those moments haha, Persona 5 had such a good dub and Persona 5 Strikers keeps the tradition.

-----

Thanks to everyone involved in the production of this game, it is really an amazing game and I felt so happy while playing it.
There are so many good things to write about Persona 5 Strikers that would make my review so big, but in short, thank you very much for creating such cool game for my favorite series!

author: af6c21d3d89152b3911b5c6d08140527
content:
summary get this if you finished persona 5 or royal.

this game is a p5/p5r base setting with changed battle system and also social system since the story set after p5 ending which you suppose to max confidant with all your friend. story wise still the same p5 vibe so if you like p5 you like this as well.

as for gameplay most ppl think this is a warrior like gameplay with p5 skin, while truth is its persona/smt series base system but changed to warrior like battle style with it p5 battle adaption such as weakness/all out attack/baton pass/show time etc... it start out kinda difficult when you dont understand the game or you are not action game player, but as you play and understand the system more you feel the p5 adaption is on point. 

overall while the game is far from perfect but it put in effort to try new stuff instead of just skin change. maybe it will be better next adaption if there any.

author: 6e1a58000f3650f9a58c13ac74253fc1
content: P5R通关后度过了空虚的两天，赶上促销4折入手，开着正常难度在第一个精英天界审判官那里灭了半小时就改成简单摆了，34小时通关，战斗各方面因为选的简单基本是随便打，个人也是第一次玩无双类游戏，体感还不错。BGM相比P5R就失色多了，有几首是老歌新调，唯一印象深的就是第五个监狱的BGM，配合英雄的基调很带感。最后是重点的剧情，我估摸大伙都是冲着p5续作可以再看到怪盗团买的。个人认为剧情比P5R的好太多了，相比某松饼侦探强行卖腐，路人女主存在感很低，P5S的两个新角色塑造可说是完爆了。没有任何喂蚀情节，角色觉醒的经历也不落窠臼。甚至其他的配角也是有血有肉生动形象。至于怪盗团成员，P5R因为主线原因压缩了成员间的互动，导致后期好几个人都没存在感了。而在这作能看到京介，杏，春等人活跃的身影，个人尤其喜欢第二个监狱京介和BOSS的互动。总而言之，P5粉丝必买的一个续作，当然原价400多还是贵了，建议等打折再入。

author: 6936c22464d85a9bbfa3361f42fbc9a7
content:
As a huge fan of Persona 5, I picked up this game without a second thought. It’s always great to see the Phantom Thieves back in action, and the game definitely had its fun moments early on.

That said, the culprits in this game felt repetitive. Their backstories all seemed to follow the same formula: they were bullied as kids, and that led them to become villains. It felt like they were just copy-paste versions of each other, which made the story feel less original.

If you’re a Persona 5 fan, this game might still be worth playing—it does offer the charm and style you’d expect. But honestly, I hope Atlus dives deeper into storytelling for future games instead of relying on the same tropes. They can do better than this.

author: 5a95f0f13aad5f708144b26baf342a93
content:
玩着真难受啊，团员快快乐乐的全国旅游的氛围还行，但是这个操作，明明就是完完全全的粉丝向续作，按键操作还给我改了，我手动改按键每个按键又只能一处用，战斗日常又分不开来，这个还好毕竟只要按两下就习惯了。
每次进新监狱就给你塞一大堆委托叫你去做，主要是没什么意思吧，特别是找愿望，要找攻略才能玩的舒服，潜入任务更是，又不能和p5一样灵活隐蔽，基本上就是挡路就杀过去，又臭又长，没意思，还没有回家轨道，有些阴间地方离存档点远的一，真是服气，跟着怪盗团闯监狱真就跟坐牢一样啊，玩着一点爽感都没有还无双呢笑了，我是不会打开二周目了，评价是不如p5新开一周目。
ui还是有p5味儿的，但是动画有点长，有些拖沓了，没有p5干脆利落的感觉，进关和出关的动画真的太长了，难受真的，各种地方都有一种p5阉割的感觉，可以理解是为了塞进ns，但是p5r不也好好塞进去了吗（。
总而言之就是不好玩，我是冲着怪盗团集合团建来的，我也玩到了我想玩的，大家说说笑笑又是一路走来的感觉很好我很喜欢，剧情方面是很舒服的，但是结果是给我带来的负反馈远大于正反馈，评价是不如看实况补补，快跑，快跑，别来，回p5r钓钓鱼打打牌都好。

author: c438203924e95253b2e57fd5b10c2bae
content:
페르소나 4,5를 재미있게 한데다가 같은 무쌍계인 파이어엠블렘 무쌍을 재미있게 해서 이건 갓겜일거라는 확신을 가지고 샀습니다.

분명 페르소나의 요소와 무쌍의 요소가 모두 들어가있는데, 제가 생각했던 거랑은 너무도 다르네요.

페르소나처럼 캐릭터 조작 + 총격 + 페르소나를 소환한 공격이 가능한데 화면이 훅훅 지나가서 뭐가 뭔지도 모르겠고

적이 많이 나오는건 분명 무쌍 스타일인데 잡졸 전투는 너무 빨리 끝나고, 조금 강한 보스만 해도 배리어를 몇개씩 깨야해서 뭔가 늘어지고 (심지어 제일 보스들은 더 하다면서요?)

페르소나5 후일담 + 전국여행이라는 굉장히 매력적인 컨셉이라 스토리만이라도 보려고 어떻게든 전투를 참고 해보려 했는데 스테이지1부터 제일 극혐하는 '목적지까지 오셨군요 그런데 더 나아가기 위해서는 맵 반대편으로 가서 기믹을 해제해야 합니다' 인데다가 본편에서는 앞에 있는 조커도 제대로 못보는 잡졸들이 갑자기 유능해진데다가 숨는 포인트도 줄어들어서 원치 않는 전투를 해야하는 경우도 종종 있습니다.

세이프룸 세이브 방식도 썩 친절한건 아니었지만 그래도 각 플로어마다 어지간하면 세이프룸이 있어서 중간중간 끊기 좋은데 스크램블은 초반임을 감안한다고 해도 제일 중간에서 저장공간이 보이지 않아 참 불편합니다.

그리고 분명 UI가 페르소나5 UI인데 묘하게 다르고 허접합니다. 나중에 더 해보고 정 안되겠으면 유튜브에디션으로 쫑내야겠습니다.

author: 7c662b1061455b6eb2488876961a9341
content:
P5Rを2周クリアしてからのP5Sプレイです

[h1] ニッポンの夏　怪盗団の夏 [/h1]

といった感じで本編後日譚として夏休みにキャンピングカーで日本全国旅行というリア充まる出しの展開です

P5R発売前のP5S発売の為、芹澤かすみ[spoiler] すみれ[/spoiler]が登場しないのが残念ですが、新キャラ・・・特にソフィアが良い味を出しており通販画面で「買え買え～」言われると大して欲しくもないアイテムまで購入してしまいます

肝心のゲーム性ですがアクションの中にP5Rの特徴を落とし込んであり、主人公以外のキャラも操作する事が出来てボタンアクションやバトンタッチで上手に弱点を突きながら戦うスタイルはP5Sの方が個人的には好みでした
回復アイテムや強化/弱体魔法といったP5Rであれば行動順を１回消費するような行動もロスなしで使用出来るので利用機会が多くラストエリクサー症候群に陥りにくい点もよく練りこまれていると感じる部分です

良くない点としては決定ボタンとキャンセルボタンがP5RとP5Sで逆配置（P5Rの方が日本ではスタンダード）なので押しミスが多くプレイしにくかったです
一応コンフィグで変更する事も可能ですがフィールド探索に反映されないのでかえってややこしい事になると思い「慣れる」という選択をしましたが、次に別のJRPGをプレイした際これまた押しミス頻発という・・・仕様は統一して頂きたいと思いました


総評としては戦闘がアクション操作になった正統続編という内容です
難易度EASYがあるのでアクションが苦手な方でも楽しめると思います（ストーリー内容は難易度による変化なし）
P5Rを未プレイの方は話についていけない部分が出てくるので先にP5Rをプレイする事をおすすめしますが、それ以外の方はプレイして「損した」という事にはならない出来に仕上がっていると思いますので是非プレイされてみてください

author: 13024bee4d5b50df8ab09a40096cc8f0
content:
作为P5无印版的续作，谁再说这是无双游戏我跟谁急。

整个游戏流程大约三十小时，游戏的核心机制跟p5一样抢先手打弱点，只是从回合制变成了act，normal难度下难度较为适中，并没有无双游戏那种割草的快感，此外由于boss血厚盾厚，加上物理系技能大削弱，法系技能可以说一枝独秀，由于前期sp不足且sp的回复药获取资源比较少（妙妙，我滴妙妙），反而需要对技能的释放精打细算并熟悉游戏的各种连招，与其说无双不如说更像传统act游戏。

音乐和剧情维持了p系列一贯的高水准，剧情比不过p5的神中神但绝对是值得好评的佳作水准。

p5粉丝可以大胆入，不是p5粉丝的可以在玩过p系列游戏成为粉丝后再入。

author: 9ab038fffdb7587982a3ce77882d7e08
content:
This game s l a p s.

Loved the remixed tracks from Persona 5 and the new tracks for the jails are PERFECT for the atmosphere. 
The story has nods to the original persona 5 but doesn't require the player to have played it, and the new characters are smoothly introduced. 
But most of all, this gameplay is so satisfying. The system for leveling up Joker's personas is well made and allows for some extremely complex planning, and hitting enemy weaknesses feels gratifying. 

Literally my only quarrel is that sometimes the audio balance for the voice acting feels way off. I assume it was recorded when everyone was working from home.

author: bea6c54d95ca50068a6f5b9e480ffc9b
content:
超棒的续作，原本玩P5时我就觉得这剧情比起P系列的日常系统，更适合线性叙述，节奏紧凑更能衬托出精彩之处。
个人觉得EMMA更适合放在R里，虽然丸喜的塑造更完善，但若两者调换，能更契合双方的主旋律。
比较遗憾的部分也有，比如一之濑，这人物的塑造太欠缺，她人物的第一印象比丸喜还强烈，然而却缺席了很长时间，主线精彩处才来个嘴遁强行胜利，这点个人是十分不喜欢。
最后是要诟病的几点
首先是支线，尤其是同伴的任务，我幸幸苦苦完成了，却只用黑幕和几行字就带过，这也太偷懒了吧？明明结尾处还有画像。更别说其他不合理的重复劳动。
其次是战斗系统，虽然P系列成分更多，也不是那么无双，但容易眼花缭乱，并且可能是我没挑战高难度的原因，后期基本就是很单调的重复作业。

————————修改后的补充——————————

原本本篇在日常剧情相对欠缺，因此这一作是作为P5青春日常的补充，个人也相对满意，但由于事情的严重性，又冲淡了轻松愉快的日常，这点还是相当可惜的。
个人觉得，其实可以不必动不动就世界毁灭，或遁入无限月读之类的发展，就不能给个更轻松愉快的假期，更多怪盗团一起干蠢事犯傻的暑假旅程吗？

author: e067e48cd8535858806d61ca49cea472
content:
Persona 5 Strikers (P5S) is an action RPG title that is co-developed with Omega Force - who popularized Musou-style action genre with Dynasty Warriors series where the action revolves around mowing down ridiculous hordes of enemies. I initially posted my review at the 37h mark (around 3/4 of the story) but felt compelled after I've finished the game to make the review more complete, in order to do it justice - because the game went from being pretty good at first to being great when I was technically done with it. 

It should be noted that P5S appears to be the canonical sequel to Persona 5 (P5), so if you're the type that needs to follow stories in chronological order, you might want to pass on this game for now. Personally, I've yet to play P5 myself although I do have some background having watched the awful Persona 5: The Animation before. If you have no background of P5, some names and terminology that come up in the game might leave you confused but I don't think they are a huge issue. And if you're invested in the story thereafter, then all the more reason to pick up Persona 5 Royal (P5R) - the definitive version of P5 also available on Steam - when you're done with P5S.

In terms of gameplay, other titles in the Musou genre (which I'll refer to as "Musous") are laid out in mission stages where the combat field (the stage itself) involves mowing down hordes of enemies while completing set objectives - visceral large-scale combat on an open field while being outnumbered and yet overpowered. However, P5S's game structure is that of a JRPG and is an authentic Persona experience. Instead of stages, P5S uses JRPG dungeons (known here as "jails") which become available as the story progresses. When encountering an enemy (or via scripted events) in dungeons, it will usually spawn a horde of enemies - this is where the Musou-influence comes into play. If you're familiar with Persona series, just think of the turn-based combat being replaced by action combat. There are some minor platforming/puzzle-solving in various dungeons which I didn't appreciate but they do add variety. Outside dungeons, you hang around in a designated open city like those in the Yakuza series except there's no fighting to be had. There are side quests in the game (known as requests) which are mostly kill/fetch quests - nothing super interesting but aren't annoying either. In terms of content, there's the main story comprising of a few dungeons. Finishing the story will allow you to make a clear save to access post-game content which comes in the form of requests to obtain the best weapons for your team. Finishing the post-game content will then allow you to start NG+ which also unlocks the highest difficult, "Merciless". In NG+, everything you previously earned is carried over. There are a total of 9 playable characters and 8 of them are accessible from the start of your first "non-tutorial" dungeon while the 9th will join later in the story. In NG+, you can access all 9 in the first actual dungeon.

Combat is one area the game shines in and caters to various styles of play. The controls in the game are responsive and all the Persona mechanics are very well integrated into the combat. Your attacks are made up by strings of basic attacks ending with a special attack. In addition, you have a dodge that has invincibility frames and can invest points in perks later on to capitalize on perfect dodges. If you're not a fan of fast-paced action, there's also a dedicated button to access your personas and also freezes time. There's also access to Persona fusion like any other Persona games. Different personas have different (but fixed) effects at the end of their combo strings, so finding a good mix of skills that work well alongside the combo strings is what the substance of build-making is - figuring out what skills are good and the fusion path to inherit the skills you want, to the target persona to fuse. In P5S, skills learnt by personas (i.e. not inherited from fusion) are always remembered and can be reconfigured when out of combat. The party size is up to 4 and members can be changed when out of combat, with the main restriction that Joker (the main protagonist) must always be in the team. So if you want to go at it alone, you can do so but only with Joker. All characters have a different play style and you can swap to any party (not team) member during combat. Progression takes the form of levels/equipment, persona roster, character-specific arts and a bond board which is used to unlock team-wide perks. Combat may initially feel plain and restrictive due to low SP gauge for abilities but gets better with game progression as characters learn new skills and from unlocking perks at the bond board. Although Musous tend to have a bad rep for being no-brainer button-mashers, P5S isn't quite the case and you can play it as a skill-based game by not abusing consumables, which will be in short supply anyway unless you grind for them. Boss fights are especially fun.

The story is pretty decent and the storytelling really shines here - compared to Persona 5 - which is helped by the good writing, overall presentation and a focus on bonding events. The dialogues are mostly full voiced and the English dub is pretty good. The script is well-written and there's a lot of humour which the voice actors did a really good job delivering. The story cutscenes and non-action-related gameplay takes up like 50% of the game, so if you're invested in the story, then it's great; if not, the game will feel like a beefed up visual novel with sparse but lengthy action gameplay in-between. While I did enjoy the story conversations, one gripe I have with it is that there's a lot of repeated info which feels like intentional padding rather than real value to the overall plot. For Persona fans specifically, there aren't any social links here and literally zero consequences to player choice. However, there are many bonding events that do a terrific job of fleshing out the friendship of the protagonists - like in Persona 4 Golden (P4G). P5 was disappointing to me story-wise, but P5S pretty much redeemed it for me - in fact, I prefer its story-telling over the former.

Presentation is top notch in pretty much every Persona game I know of (since Persona 3) and this one is no slouch either. The UI is sleek and stylish while remaining usable. Combat looks amazingly flashy and feels good to pull off combos/abilities. My only gripe with the visuals is that the UI clutter can make fights with a lot of enemies difficult to read. The music was initially only serviceable for me, but did grew on me over time. I really like the themes in the dungeons of the later half and the remixes of the original Persona 5 tracks, like "Blooming Villain" and "Keeper of Lust". The track during the last phase of the final boss fight, "Demiurge II: Negai" was truly exceptional; it so well orchestrated with the last fight that it elevates it beyond epic - I think it's right up there with "Ameno Sagiri" (P4G), if not better. Most of these are arranged/composed by the Koei Tecmo Sound team, I believe.

Performance-wise, I'm happy to report that I didn't encounter any technical issues in the entirety of my 90+ hours playtime. Game runs great and loads fast on my AMD 2700X/GTX1060 6GB setup even when installed on a spinning HDD.

In conclusion, I've thoroughly enjoyed P5S and would strongly recommend it even at its asking price. It has a decent story that is well delivered and has a good amount of content going for it. The action combat is fun and caters well to players looking for simplicity or depth. As for replayability, it depends on how much you get tired of replaying the storyline over and over. But that's what I'm doing right now in NG+ merciless. Overall, fantastic game!

author: 9a1cd0a38e2c5a33aefc8211ef72150d
content:
一个并不割草的割草游戏，论割草不如本篇印象空间创人，不如数万箴言，伤害比较刮痧。
剧情上基本上走了本篇相同的路，最后是青春版狮童和青春版伪神，没有什么新鲜感了。
bgm上，各个监狱的bgm也远没有本篇的惊艳。
缺失了如一键卖换金道具，一键登录图鉴等便利的功能。
如果说p5本篇展示的都是jrpg的优点，p5s则展示了jrpg的缺点，诸如反复刷同一个监狱，比较烦人的各类请求。
并且本作没有本篇中的许多人物，比如我的单推妙妙，结尾的时候也没有再一次大罪穿甲弹，情怀也没多少。
总而言之，这是一款玩起来有点累的续作游戏。
如果说你是因为玩完p5r后还想继续这段旅途，这作可以带你和怪盗团周游日本，到处吃吃玩玩。但是对我来说，这作各方面都不够好，并且价格是粉丝价。非粉丝请不要购买，粉丝也请酌情考虑是否要花这个价钱体验远不如p5r的游戏。

author: b4558456e8235fa884908675fd1da7c5
content:
Los Chorizos Fantasmas estan de vuelta para una ultima aventura.

Unos meses despues del final de Persona 5, Joker y Morgana vuelven a Tokyo para pasar el verano con la banda y resulta que hay alguien jodiendo con el metaverso otra vez y cambiando los corazones de la poblacion, asi que los muchachos se ven obligados a hacer algo al respecto. La diferencia es que para esta altura los personajes ya son re porongas, asi que la amenaza principal no se siente tan apremiante. Sabes que los Phantom Thieves le van a romper la cara a quien esta detras de todo y eso deja lugar a un juego que no se toma tan en serio asi mismo y que tiene muchisimo fan-service e INCLUSO MAS humor que la entrega anterior
El juego tiene el framing de un Road Trip, lo cual es una idea genial. Vas viajando por todo Japon en un motorhome por cuestiones de la historia, pero esto mismo es una excelente excusa para ver a los personajes viviendo alocadas aventuras (y morfando hasta el hartazgo) en distintas ciudades.

Algo importantisimo a aclarar es que para esta entrega el sistema de combate deja de ser por turnos y pasa a ser tipo hack and slash, pero super rapido y estilizado. Piensen Devil May Cry pero contra docenas de enemigos al mismo tiempo. Asimismo, la musica de combate son, en su mayoria, versiones mixadas de temas clasicos de Persona 5, pero en versiones tirando a metal. Keeper of Lust y Last Surprise se llevan las palmas. Una maravilla como siempre la musica, no es de extrañar.

En fin, es una mas que digna despedida para estos personajes tan queridos. Ojala los volvamos a ver algun dia.

author: 4c2a03e1a4f0516291b7afe4eed00a31
content:
I'm kinda finding it to be pretty...meh...so far. It's not good. It's not bad. It's just kind of okay. Musou style combat really, REALLY doesn't work for me personally, and that's essentially all the game is inbetween story segments. (Which feel pretty weird given the low stakes post Persona 5, although I imagine that will ramp up over time.)

More concerning is that there really isn't any arcs for the characters to go through (save perhaps Sophia) since all the characters have already been through their arcs in the first game. So there's no place for them to really grow and no way for them to really develop.

I've cleared the first "jail" and am about to go on the road trip, but tbh I'm kind of thinking this game will end up being a very forgettable experience for me personally.

author: 0b507c12dc9b5e70815417b346ecc6cd
content:
P5无印版是大概4年多以前玩的。上个月初打完了P5R。这个月初打完了P5S。。
相比本篇，P5S日常跟社群之类的东西都没了，变成纯线性游戏了，一周目全支线都做的情况，流程也就30多小时。二周目除了多个最高难度跟一个新P路西法可以用，二周目可玩性并不高，我是为了打全成就才玩的二周目，二周目流程打了三分之二就全成就了，之后就懒得玩了，然后一周目后期凹P又用了10个小时左右才玩这么久。
接着详细评测下吧。
剧情方面，剧情中规中矩，没有本篇剧情有意思，不过打完P5再玩，能看到怪盗团重聚还是挺开心的。
总体玩下来就是个非常粉丝向的游戏，没玩过P5R或者不喜欢P5的玩家应该都不会玩。
战斗方面，这是我玩过最独特的无双游戏，用一句话总结P5S的战斗体验，我想大概就是“最还原原作战斗系统的无双游戏。”
打T，凹P，总攻击，弱点，换手，基本这些系统都在，熟悉的技能，熟悉的设定。
也有无双系列的C技系统，战斗系统基本全是光荣做的，有好几个角色的动作跟机制也设计的也很有意思。
这一作凹P比P5本篇要简单不少，加上二周目高难度敌人数值太过离谱，导致这游戏凹完P在后期的玩法变成操控男主在不断念台词扔技能。靠打T跟弱点一直变成我的回合，总体玩下来还是非常的无趣。（其实二周目最高难度也能玩C技连招打法，可是这也太难了，跟魂斗罗一样被怪碰2下就死太折磨了。）
顺便吐槽下，这游戏其实一周目开荒并不是无双游戏，精英怪跟BOSS战在前中期的难度挺高的，一不小心就会翻车。。感觉玩家是在被怪无双。
其他方面也没什么想说的，P5S就是个30多小时流程，战斗系统很有意思的粉丝向游戏。
购买推荐：本体性价比最高，豪华版是多了预购的2个特典DLC，送的道具基本没什么用，可以战斗中切换前几代的音乐倒是有点用，豪华版比标准版就多了10多块钱。
个人评分：8.9分（有粉丝向加成，实际上分并没有这么高大概只有个8分左右吧）

author: 301744cc45285fc0a66f1602bad3120b
content:
这游戏是懂pua的，第一章难得批爆，第二章稍微正常点，第三章终于有点割的感觉了。让人先是觉得什么答辩玩意，再是越来越感觉其实还行。它撑死也就还行，但是这个“还行”有了前面的答辩铺垫以后就让人觉得可以接受了

这是你妈的割草，几十个怪里塞几个带硬控的，吃一个硬控要么耗药解要么就等着被控制链摁到死吧，靠晃摇杆解控？基本怪多的时候还没晃到解控就吃上第二个了
本作探索异世界不会强制推进日期，可以在存档点出异世界补满状态再返回异世界传送到存档点继续推（所以为什么不直接把存档点做成篝火那样摸一下回满状态？）而且每次出来都会刷新商店药品折扣和其他的商店库存，所以最佳玩法就是打到存档点，出来，嘎嘎买药，回去嘎嘎磕到下个存档点再重复以上操作
SP奇缺，打boss或者精英怪基本sp都花完了都只够打一次倒地总攻击。精英怪和boss伤害大半管起步高一点吃到直接秒。虽然可以在普攻连段中搓出属性技能来打弱点，但是效果奇差（打个比方耗sp放技能的迪亚能回40%血，普攻连段里搓出来的只能回10%还不到，攻击技能也是阉割版）而且前置连段够挨上一套连招了。
流水线地图，流水线战斗体验。跑图大致流程就是跑路踩三个点，打三个精英怪，然后再去现实中踩个点，再打个梆硬的锹形虫精英怪然后去打boss。战斗体验就是嗯放weak技能或者使用场景道具打倒地值，总攻击，没sp，hp了就嗑药。
UI方面，比起p5r反而倒退了。要是不会做p5r那种黑白动画菜单你就直接把p5r的偷过来用就好，搞个捞的一批的黑白的3d模型动画，一点都没内味，反而那低能渲染让我感觉在看灰模demo。
俩新角色，锐评一下新的女角色不管是设定还是服装都像是个赛尔号超能nono出道当vtuber了
评价是不如p5r一根毛，要是喜欢p5那去my palace里再多打两把大富翁都比这破游戏好。要是喜欢割草那不如闪乱神乐，还能看奶子。
还有顺带一提，日厂特有逆天优化的传统可不能落下，cpu越好，游戏体验越烂，12代i9一秒一帧。找了评论区的processlasso才解决

author: cc5241b9859b52baafa81af82c68f6f4
content:
继P5R的剧情，以无双游戏为蓝本的佳作。专治因为P5R通关导致的电子阳痿。
作为一个无双类游戏，敌人数量虽不如其他无双，但是系统还是优化了不少的。几乎没有怪物有全属性无弱点的设定，甚至boss们也都有一到两个属性的弱点，这让该作玩起来爽快很多。切Persona，吃药之类的操作在游戏暂停时可以完成，也让整体体验更加流畅。因为这些改动，切换可以针对boss的Persona毫无代价，这使游戏比起P5R来简单很多。根据Persona的固有技能，发动属性技能甚至可以做到不消耗任何SP，也让R中缺魔的噩梦一扫而空（虽然大前期还是有些吃紧）。
剧情就不说了，叙事质量，任务演出，音乐和美术设计，都跟R一样高水平。

当然缺点不可能没有，以下列举几点，以防有你无法接受的地方：
- 锁60帧，最宽只支持16:9比例
- 打起来画面眼花缭乱，很难看清每个怪物的出招。不过乱斗的时候倒也不用看清出招，而打boss时屏幕也就他一个，不太存在这个问题。
- 游戏在大段剧情推进后的关键地方也不设置自动保存（例如打败关键boss后），如果你的系统不太稳定，有可能会出现玩了一俩小时然后死机丢档的情况
- 打属性克制有些过于简单，所有的怪物一上来就会告诉你全部的属性关系。个人认为至少做成P5R那样，需要玩家挨个试一遍才能摸透怪物属性的设定，会更加科学一些。

aAt least at the beginning, you can't take 5 steps without triggering a cutscene that goes hey there is an enemy hey you can jump up there hey there is a treasure chest

The presentation, VA, just general style, are all truly top notch, I'll give them that ... and that's about all the positivity I can muster. Ehhh

content:
まだクリアしておりませんが、ウインターセールで安くなっている今が買う人が多いと思うのでレビューします。
（ペルソナ５ロイヤルクリア済み）

[b]良い点[/b]
・	[b]掛け合いが面白い[/b]
フルボイスかつ、ペルソナ５無印からちゃんと話が続いているので前作をやっていればクスッと笑える場面が多いです。
逆に言えば、今作からプレイするとなると話を理解するのに時間がかかると思います。

・	[b]ちゃんと無双ゲームしてる[/b]
コーエーさんとの共同開発とのことで、しっかりペルソナ無双ゲームになっています。
ただ、弱点や環境物を使わないと簡単に４ぬので、爽快感はスキルなどを整えてからになると思います。

[b]悪い点[/b]
・　[b]UI が甘い[/b]
ペルソナ5r と比べてUIの作りこみが甘いです。
ペルソナ特有のかっこいいメニュー画面やロード画面は健在ですが、文字のUIが所々甘いと感じました。

・　 [b]ペルソナファンには向かないが、ペルソナ５ファンには向いている。[/b]
先述の通り、５の続編であるのと、RPG要素がなくなっているので、なんだコレ感が否めないと思います。


僕はプレイしながら常にニヤニヤしているので、ペルソナ５好き、ペルソナ５ｒの喪失感で鬱になっている人、一緒にニヤニヤしよう！

author: b888494ee9d95b2f83e60882bfe73be7
content:
[h1]9/10 请和我一起喊：P5天下第一！[/h1]
==========================================
众所周知，一般喊P5天下第一都是代指P5或P5R，但是我认为P5S也完全能付得起这一口号。
首先是剧情，继承P5的时间线，因此没有第三学期以及学妹和老师的剧情，当然也没有二五仔的
P5S的剧情并没有因为游戏题材类型的改变而与本体出现很大的不同，相反，很好的衔接着本体的人物关系，日常互动的感觉也和本体基本相同（路人：某位艺人脚踏9条船...），这让直接从P5R来玩P5S的我沉浸感很强。故事里对正义的理解以及团员之间的支持也是十分出色，让我掉眼泪的地方也有不少，很对我的胃口。大明说出的“需要的不是孩子气的正义感，而是执行正义的系统！”值得深思。
然后是战斗，制作类型虽然是无双型，但即使是低难度，BOSS甚至精英怪一套控制带高伤也能带走满血的我，可能这个无双是怪的无双吧_(:з」∠)_，战斗期间非常强调攻击弱点，既可以形成1MORE追加攻击，还能让小兵倒地之后发动总攻击AOE，更多的还是像ARPG一些。可操作的人物有九个，每个人物还有自己的技能逻辑，我在游玩过程中可以说很享受换手＋耍帅的过程（然后就忘了使用面具。。
最后是音乐，除了在偷心时（大叔：喂喂喂....这与其说是怪盗，不如说是强盗吧……）响起熟悉的Life Will Change，迷宫内、战斗时的音乐都是非常好听且耐听的，插入时间也极为恰当，扣人心弦。

一些加分点：人格面具超出持有上限依然可以扩图鉴还能免费召唤；祐介：I am the storm that is approaching！！
一些扣分点：键鼠键位中有一个B和H也就算了，毕竟鼠标按键也可以实现，这个N就有点离谱了，还要经常使用。在搭配组合技能的时候就有些反人类了；支线要求重复限制多，要求都是用某个人某个地点某个方式打掉多少只怪；画面锯齿严重，对话框为什么会有锯齿啊！

感觉游戏内容还是太短了！毕竟这一次一个月就拯救世界了！

author: 0c6756f069a559468db5fbb980bdc23f
content:
只能算一个勉强及格的游戏，P5粉丝当后日谈看看就行了，别期待多好玩
[b]主线[/b]  
迷宫地图都非常一般，几乎全是大平地，没有P5R那种精致的感觉。流程千篇一律，都是爬3个塔、打一个精英怪，最后再打boss。剧情倒是和P5R的味道比较像，喜欢P5R的玩家应该也会喜欢的。

[b]支线[/b]  
高情商：给我一种玩异度之刃1的感觉
低情商：重复无趣，打怪，捡垃圾，跑路，合P。只有几个和队友有关的支线可以算是有些意思。

[b]战斗[/b]  
动作系统突出一个一盘散沙，动作和指令的联系微乎其微，并没有像FF7RE那样结合起来。
玩家的动作性能过于贫弱，即使C技可以无消耗放面具的技能出来，但是往往也会因为C技前置太长或者伤害/削盾太低，导致平砍在打强力敌人的时候几乎没有收益。所以我为什么不干脆一直用面具放技能呢？反正SP没了从检查点离开迷宫重进就能回复满。而且回复道具可以在战斗中随时随地使用，获取成本也比较低廉，让本就没用的C技显得更加没有存在感。总而言之，这套系统玩起来既不动作，也不回合，原地复读扔技能嗑药竟然才是收益最大的玩法。

author: 1262a7778fd056078c0eefba5201f605
content:
Take your heart again!——回合与无双胶合的完美典范。
  2022年12月24日，我用20小时32分小时通关并用N小时白金了PS4版本《女神异闻录5：魅影攻手》，"天下第一"的JRPG与格格不入的"无双"梦幻联动，再次上演了一段青春校园剧，心之怪盗团の旧业重操。
  要说动漫直接改编成无双，avg改编无双不稀奇，但jrpg摇身一变为无双是真的特例，最主要的是光荣还成功了，玩家反响普遍不错。首先聊聊体验，ns锯齿化严重，pc版本我并不清楚，但ps4体验是完美60fps的，采用的是虚幻4引擎，和p5的画风些许区别，动画cg也均用游戏实机进行代替，整体上可以说是p5r的延续，不管是玩法还是剧情，但实际上还是增添了很多新元素的。p5s中把日本本土的地域风情毫不留情地展现出来，游览日本各个城市，各个城市都有自己的特色，这方面制作组还是没有敷衍了事。战斗方面，则是
披着无双的皮，实则是回合的策略灵活，说实话，无双实际上并不完全无双，在中高难度下一不留意还是会被敌人来个措手不及的残血连招的，加上本作金钱的溢出但是道具的限制，sp的需求更为突出，所以难度还是有的，经常会出现卡关现象。虽然保留了回合制的元素，但爽快感和原作中的流畅丝毫没有减弱，反而更上一层楼，时停时使用克制的人格面具，紧接敌人破防后瞬移的合击，有时甚至加上一招st和充斥场景内无数的属性道具，打击感与爽快感也油然而生，这点可谓是p5s最具特色，也最优秀的一点，既坚持着p5的根基，也借鉴优秀无双元素。地图与迷宫设计，人格面具种类，剧情流程上虽逊于p5，但依旧优秀，其中也舍弃了原作中好感度，社群等交际系统，换之的是新角色的加入与福利泳衣，对新人物的刻画也是可圈可点的，和地图细节一样，诚意十足，个性鲜明。音乐方面就无需多言了，p5s与p5r新旧并存，行云流水的战斗配合热血沸腾的爵士乐，让无双偷心并不单一。其中让我想吐槽的是p5s没有继承p5r的"便捷"反而是延续了p5的"繁琐与复杂"例如没有一键回家之类的。但都瑕不掩瑜，主要是会免白漂!
  阔别不到半年的怪盗团再度启程，p5之所以能成为系列之最，优秀的jrpg系统，与我们这群青年紧密贴切的青春校园日常和这放荡不羁的正义剧情，及时未来我不属于这个年代，想必紧握手柄，哼唱旋律，戴上面具的时候，何尝不是一种"物是人非"的感动与悸动呢。

author: a3438bbdeedd581fbae2123511326df3
content:
Visual : The game looks really beautiful. It is more prettier than P5R.
Performance : Never had any performance issues with my intel i7 8th gen, 16GB DDR3 ram,  Gtx 1060 6GB locked in 60 fps.
Story: The story is good. not as detailed as other persona games but you will have fun time. The writing is really good and there are some cheesy line. Futaba might annoy you with some dialogues but other than that it's fine.
Combat: oh boy it's hit or miss. First I don't like the combat (recommending to play it in easy mode). It's dynasty warrior with persona paint on it. you can use you persona ability, items, baton pass but it's totally different game. I stopped playing after defeating first 2 villains. A month later i came back and exploring third dungeon and I really liking it now. Maybe it's because I was missing turned based combat that's why I didn't like the combat in the first place. In those months i was playing Persona 3 FES and some shooter games. I am surprised how good the combat feels now and on top of that the third dungeon is s cool. Dungeon crawling is really good i like it since i played it for the first time, it has nice platforming which I enjoy.

conclusion: It's not a spin off game. It is a sequel. It has lot of references from P5, There are some characters who related with Persona 5 characters and phantom thieves. If you never played any persona games before then try it who knows you may get hooked. Trying something new is always fun until you understand how battle system works.

author: 5acaf0a0664858a298bbb4af73aaf051
content: Whereas this game's fanbase is a cancer, this is still an excellent ghame. Try not to listen to the people calling it overrated garbage. The small but vocal amount of people calling the the game overrated were told by others that it was the best game ever made, and when it did not meet those expectations, they justifiably thought it was overrated. This may be the best game ever to many, but not all. No matter what however, calling the game simply 'bad' instead of 'not perfect' or 'not my thing' would be an outright lie. Gameplay is tight and very creative, playing into the plot perfectly. I will not reveal any spoilers about this game since it is best to go in completely blind. If you are even somewhat interested in the genre or intrigued by the screenshots, buy this game. You will not regret it.

author: eeb2454a714450e7b5cf79e75826a573
content:
まずは言わなきゃならない事と言えば、これはペルソナ5の[b]続きではない[/b]。
勘違いしちゃダメだよ。

それを裏付ける要素はあっちこっちにある。
・システムはペルソナ5より劣る：マップでのダッシュ、メニューのテンポの良さとか。
・ペルソナ5の物語に触れる内容は殆どない：花火での雨・メメントス・仲間という初期設定段階で確定したもの以外は何もない。
・ザ・ロイヤルの続編ではないからかすみはいないとか読んでたが。これは何らかの冗談：無印の伏線そのものは[b]回収されず仕舞[/b]だ。
というかその伏線の元となる人物は初期設定で存在しないのか、話題の欠片もない。

だから続編とみなされながら結構がっかりな結果と言わずを得ない。
[b]というか、めっちゃがっかりした。ええ。[/b]

当のゲームそのものに関しても称賛しづらい。
・曲と演出は凄く良くて戦闘に興奮することしばしば。
・あっちこっちに旅しながら動くことでペルスオナ5に足りなかった仲間との[b]交流[/b]を補われ結構楽しめる
というのは利点と言うべき。

そこからの欠点はでかい。
・難易度だ。NORMALでやるが、予め弱点属性を知る方が圧倒的友利上で途中にキャラを[b]変えられない[/b]からうざい。当然それは大物戦に限る話だが、そういう大物はわんさかいると言う冗談にしか思えない状態なんだよね。
しかもスキル自体は出さずコンボで決める前提なのに確認はできないのでどのペルソナは使えるのかは怪しいし、ちょっとレベルを上げるとステータスの上りも悪くなるから、変える必要は出てくるし。何とも言えないうざさ。
二周目に解放されるRISKYは一発勝負というかこれ命名間違ってない！？
・一々戦う羽目になる。たとえ相手は圧倒的格下でもだ。そこは5との快適さに大きい無さを感じる。なんにせ、結構戻されるしな。
・クエストは4に逆戻りとか唖然とした。5ではようやく「あれ取って来い」というお約束から解放されたのにここでは戻ってくる。しかもアイテム意外に[b]得られるものもない[/b]し、配達員やりたいなら普通に現実で出来るから勘弁願いたい。
・描写は足りないというか5は無駄に凝ってたのに今回は基本に戻って会話で済まそうとすることは多い多い。それもクエストと絡むとやりがいはすこぶるないな。
・最後に一番の問題点であるダンジョンの長さ。はっきり言ってゲームの[b]5分の4はダンジョン[/b]に費やされる。それなりに楽しめるとしても限度はあるぞ。

という事からして疲れる上であまり実りがない作品。
ペルソナ5の伏線はそのままでそれらの答えとなれる続編へ[b]希望を断つ作品[/b]でもあるから後味はかなり悪い。

あれでちゃんと続編だったらと思わずにいられない。

author: dbf3904e8dae5352ac7a8933fbf60005
content:
TL;DR - A slightly diluted sequel of vanilla Persona 5 with action-oriented combat and the soul of the original game, play only if you've played and liked P5.

Oh boy, it took me a quite a while to get through the somewhat overwhelming and slow first few hours of the game but in the end it was worth it. The "issues" I ran into at the start are subjective, you get to use all of the characters at the start and there is a lot to learn, not to mention playing on Hard difficulty made it difficult for me to progress until I got the hang of some mechanics as I was getting destroyed so it was mostly my fault.

The game is difficult only if you're unsure of what you're doing, as you get through the game and learn combos, how to manage your resources and what's important, it becomes much easier.

What makes the game diluted is that the jails are less in-depth than palaces and there are no confidants, so it is a much more streamlined experience with fewer things to tie you to the story and characters emotionally, though the original in a way did that for you already.

The combat itself is in my opinion superior to the turn-based version because of the depth, you can control 4 characters at once with Joker being the wild card (being able to use multiple personas), and each character has their own combos including mechanics like dodging, parries and perfect dodges. As you learn these things you'll be able to handle most things in the game with ease.

The story, while not on par with vanilla's, is still good despite being slow for the first two or three jails, after that point the entire progression of jails changes and everything flows much more smoothly. It really does feel like a sequel (because it is) and not some spin-off, it is perfect if multiple playthroughs of the original games don't cut it anymore. What holds it back a bit is that the stakes are noticeably smaller, or to put it differently, since the Phantom Thieves are no longer newbies, saving the world only feels like a road trip and not a struggle for survival like it did in the original games.

The music for me PERSONALLY is less consistently good but when comparing it to P5's music standards it is still really good, I simply have more memorable soundtracks in the original comparing to Strikers.

The game has a post-game with beefed up bosses and some new content, as I am writing this I haven't yet tried this content but I intend to clear it, I went from feeling uneasy whenever I thought about struggling to welcoming the challenge now that I know how to approach the gameplay.

Overall, I enjoyed the game and I would implore every Persona 5 fan to try it, I really hope there will be more Persona 5 media in the future because despite playing Vanilla and Royal multiple times, saying goodbye again still stings.

8.5/10

author: f9dd2de491d754f280e0267198c98169
content:
P5正统续作，延续了P5的高水准，放心购入。[spoiler] 善吉是我觉得整个P系列里塑造的最帅的教皇 [/spoiler] 

剧情虽然没有P5那么惊艳，但也够得上优秀的标准。非常新奇的是，本作中被改心的对象分布在日本各地，主角团用环日本游的方法让他们改心，通过这种叙事手法将许多现实中的名胜景点介绍给玩家。比较可惜的是没有继承原作的Coop系统，可选项比较少。

战斗方面并不是很有无双的感觉，反而很贴近原作（指蓝很少完全不敢用）。本作中也没有气功系技能，只有在一周目结束后获得伟大水晶加上爱丽丝的魔术资质、灵魂窃取后才不缺蓝。 每个角色的战斗方法都设计的很有特色且符合性格，最终决战的设计也非常巧妙。

content:
非常优秀的ARPG P5续作，剧情结构虽然和P5有许多相似之处，但就吃这套王道剧情，还有怪盗团旅游互动也很满足。正义和希望的剧情倒是远好于P5R了，这点很不错。可惜整体系统内容不够丰富，都做了很多的简化，基本就是聚焦于迷宫战斗了。

author: 3326c0ffbf195f69a26950effe467974
content:
22.7小时P5S通关！怪盗团暑假继续冒险，暑假速通拯救世界！
本作并不长，因为没有每日自由活动找人做COOP的环节，游戏流程都是固定的（毕竟要两个月速通），在暑假开车环绕日本旅游吧！因为是固定流程，你可以看到怪盗团非常温馨的旅游日常，这是P5R所欠缺的。通关P5R和P5S真让我想去日本旅游，来一手圣地巡游！
战斗：本作为无双游戏，而非前作的回合制。笔者认为还是P5R的回合制要更好玩一点，当然光荣做的无双可玩性也相当高。战斗除了最基本的打弱点外，怪盗团每位成员都有着独特的攻击组（普攻，特攻，组合技，追击，ST大招，总攻击等），每个角色都有着独特的手感和战斗体验。游戏难度并不低，推荐选择EASY模式，笔者就是用EASY通关的，大部分战斗无压力，个别战斗可能会有大战损。Boss战都设计的别出心裁，并不是数值上让人望而生怯。特别是最后的大Boss，怪盗团每个人都有出战的机会！另外值得称赞的是手柄体验极佳，震动做得非常出色，非常有代入感，极其推荐使用手柄游玩！
剧情：本作剧情比较不错，但称不上神。一如既往的坏蛋坏得让人无语，日本民众也蠢得让人无语。大Boss和P5R的[spoiler] 丸喜 [/spoiler]有点像，都是因自我逃避而用夸张的方式自以为地拯救世界。
人物：新加入的两个角色索菲亚和善吉刻画的非常出色，人物形象饱满，特别是Sophie，[spoiler] 原来AI也能觉醒人格面具的吗！大叔的怪盗形象也非常帅。[/spoiler]幕后Boss我在看到的第一眼就察觉了，[spoiler]但最后揭露其实并不算太坏。  [/spoiler]
音乐：一如既往的神，除了使用部分经典的P5音乐外还加入了其他非常带感的新音乐。Life Will Change根本让人无法拒绝好吧！
总而言之，本作基于P5给出了一个满意的续作答卷，还能有机会看到怪盗发预告信让人悔改真是太感动了。

author: 4e308feb2f7f5974b112a41187c7ff4b
content:
Persona 5 Strikers is the cure to the emptiness you were left feeling after Persona 5's credits rolled. It is more Persona 5 and thus a true sequel to it and a must-play for fans.

It takes place a few months after the last game, as Joker returns to Tokyo in a touching reunion with his friends, all voiced wonderfully by the returning cast.
The main story is structured similarly to Persona 5, but this time the crew hit the road across Japan during summer vacation in a camper van, each new foe taking them to a different city. Some of the Phantom Thieves are also linked personally in some way to these new enemies further fleshing them out, but the game's not long enough to have one for each.

Because you are always on the move there's no opportunity to form new confidants, so that system was replaced with a new Bond points system that applies to the whole team. Most of the social activities that happen are story beats, with a few optional ones that come as Requests, but they are usually with the whole group or a smaller subgroup since you are always together. I do miss my one on one time with Ryuji. 
The only character that gets one on one time is the new character Sophia as her story is integral to the plot and she often pulls you away from the rest of the group. 

The developers have done a respectful job of faithfully adapting Persona 5's game mechanics into a responsive stylish action game. It's sometimes hard to make out what's happening on the screen so they have also implemented an essential time stop mechanic when you bring up the Persona menu. 

Each character plays differently, but generally there is 3-4 hit combo that ends in a Persona finisher. I find myself regularly switching even to characters that I barely touched in Persona 5, because they are all so much fun to play here - like Yusuke who is basically Vergil from the Devil May Cry series in this. 

Strikers emulates the stylish menus of Persona 5, while also adding some cool new ones like Sophia's shop, backed up by dynamic 3D setpieces with Joker jumping from behind a corner with Ryuji pretending to shoot their guns each time you equip an item, to sitting at a table over plans with Makoto to being perched on a ledge with Ann.

The velvet room is very basic, stripped down to only fusion by result, but they added a new Persona Point (PP) system to improve your Personas. You now gain something when deleting unneeded Personas, in the form of PP. 

The music slaps just like in Persona 5 as it brings some songs back and remixes others with a rock sound, while also adding some great new ones like Welcome to the Jail and Daredevil. Lead singer Lyn returns. 

It's not all perfect as the game has a few failures on a technical level. Anti-aliasing pretty much doesn't work (including on the UI) so you have to compensate with super-resolution. Some of the 2D art in the UI is badly compressed as it looks blurry and has visual artefacts. The framerate is locked to 60 fps and the animation is tied to it. And finally there are issues with the sound mixing as some voice levels are uneven making it hard to hear the dialog in some scenes.

페르소나 5로 돈을 좀 많이 벌었던 모양인지 후속작도 내주는 아틀러스! 주인공 친구가 여기저기 다른 게임에 실컷 불려간 뒤 후속작에 불려왔다!

전작에 모든 이야기가 끝난 후, 얼마 지나지 않아 다시 만난 일행들의 좌충우돌 여행기정도로 요약할 수 있는 스토리. 전작에 있던 반전요소의 존재로 인해 스토리가 곱창난 전작에 비해, 훨씬 스토리가 깔끔한 느낌이 들었음.

아쉬운 것은 전투가 그리 깔끔하진 못했음. 최고 난이도는 평타는 내밀지도 못할 정도로 위험부담이 컸고, 노멀 난이도로 시작해도 하드로 착각될 만큼 난이도 조절엔 실패한 것으로 보임.

author: 0a758597a2ce5e23989d4e4a2d0e3417
content:
A great game to play after Persona 5 Royal.I wouldn't say this game really a spinoff because its a sequel to persona 5(NOT PERSONA 5 ROYAL).The story set after Joker defeat God so Royal character such kasumi,maruki and imposter Akechi never exist.Which make me pretty disappointed that I couldn't see Kasumi and Akechi.But after really get into the game,Its make me surprised by how good the game is.The combat not repeat like dynasty warrior or other musou style games.
The game mechanic is kept from the original game which is a Turn base Rpg to a Hack & Slash game is amazing.The mechanic really make the game never boring for just smashing attack button,instead you have to use magic to aim for weakness of shadow.The game could really punish you for not bringing the right character for boss fight.But the game sometime also kind enough to give you phantom dash to deal weakness damage to bosses
The game make you less depent on Joker and make other character more dependable.At original Persona 5,i always spammed Joker since he's the only one who can really deals damage.But at Strikers,every character have they're own unique move set and could really deal massive damage (Haru,Yusuke,..).Of course Joker have various Persona move set but i hardly ever used it.
If anyone already enjoyed Persona 5 then i believe they can also enjoy this game even its a different genre.Just seeing the Phantom Thieves once more make me happy

author: b09b92c108f258958a0d3b8f0206c72d
content:
[h1]別樹一格的P5無雙[/h1]
藉著P5R在Steam上架
我緊隨其後購入了P5S來遊玩
作為P5[spoiler]沒錯只是P5 不是P5R[/spoiler]的正統繼作
整體上我是很滿意的

[h1]怪盜團的後日談[/h1]
事隔半年 主人翁帶著行李回到盧布朗
準備跟怪盜團的大家渡過一個美滿的暑假
結果就在誤打誤撞之中再一次進入了異世界
進行了他們的日本環島拯救世界之旅

[h1]無雙系統的應用[/h1]
事關P5S是由Atlus和光榮一同開發的遊戲
當中少不然具有充滿光榮特色的無雙感覺
[i]另外我總覺得光榮手中的PANTHER好像更騷了[/i]
雖然就說融入了無雙玩法
但它不只是無雙 而是無雙的進化版本
怪盜團今次要面對的不只是一兩隻的小怪
若能夠善用屬性相剋 其實所有小怪都難不到你
但如果沒有屬性相剋 好一點就只是打得耐一點 差的可以是完全打不死的
這就正正可以讓玩家們每個角色都玩一玩 不只是玩一兩個角色
所以這點我覺得其實還好的

[h1]一如既往優質的迷宮[/h1]
承接住P5/P5R的優良特色
P5S也為大家帶來了8個十分優秀的迷宮
每個各有自己的特色 配合Boss的內心世界作設計
在一款遊戲內體驗到多種主題的迷宮
比你去玩現實中的迷宮更為值得

[h1]戀愛系統[/h1]
說到P5/P5R 一定要提到偉大的戀愛系統
不過......
P5S是沒有戀愛系統的
光榮為玩家留下的
最多只是少少的溫泉福利
只有一兩句的曖昧對白
呀！今次我學不到源義經了
[spoiler]遊戲中總總跡象表示新島真才是元配夫人[/spoiler]
[spoiler]但今集奧村春依舊很小鳥依人 不過就更成長了[/spoiler]
[spoiler]高卷杏身材依然火辣 因為今集不能追求女孩子 所以我讓你給龍司好了[/spoiler]

[h1]分離總令人覺得寂寞[/h1]
無疑在P5S應該會是P5系列的最後一作
今次就真的是怪盜團最後的波紋
透個今次暑假 認識了新朋友 遊了日本一個圈
最後在道別時真的有點感動
沒有了異世界 怪盜團也就沒有拯救世界的責任
各人回歸了各自的生活之中
沒錯 就這麼平淡地道別了
也許就是這份平淡
才會令人如此不捨 如此感觸

author: 669d82516c9756eb950f96b1690710c0
content:
约80小时全成就，一周目大概50多小时，包括了通关后凹面具以及刷等级还有一些任务的一些时间。

首先把这游戏归类为无双的出来，一周目差点死成狗，二周目R难度直接死成狗，这个死了直接从迷宫开始开始确实有点烦，上来在涉谷双角兽不知道重开多少次真是差点放弃不刷了，甚至由于只有joker一个人中途没稳住还死了两次，最后还是回来一周目好好的做出一个好用的托尔才砸雷过去，之后可以换人了就只有善吉那边翻车一次了。一周目由于直到通关都没有刻意凹面具所以连normal都经常翻车所以直接一路easy过去了。

既然都说到这了索性先说说游戏性。本作毕竟有光荣参与，但与光荣自家的无双又有很多不同，当然和自家的p5就更不用说。说实话刚开始上手难度的确是有的，就连我这个p5+光荣无双系列玩家都有点对这个杂糅的玩法接受不来，但是玩着玩着就知道一点，跟着光标提示按就完事了，没提示就跟别的无双一样OOOX啥的，本作和正传p5一样，sp都精贵的很，不到后期出爱丽丝的魔术素养以及其他band技能还有各种药丰富之前都是抠抠索索的用sp。至于joker以外的角色，也跟正传一样，由于敌人属性弱点不查攻略肯定是不知道的，就算每一个迷宫基本都有很明显的joker以外的主角，也会有一些精英怪小boss故意是不吃那个角色的属性就很蛋疼，所以一周目还没什么压力到了二周目基本就是joker一个人C了。嘛总体来说游戏性还算可以，比起光荣传统无双来说就是多了很多花样，缺点就是战斗过程节奏实在是太快，真的是一个不注意人就没了，除了技能道具这种强行时停是真的紧张感拉满。

人物建模美术音乐之类的，和之前的p5r没区别，就不赘述了。

剧情，怎么说呢，主线流程其实和正传没有区别，想象成跟着怪盗团一起行动的是新岛姐姐就行了（其实我觉得新岛冴真的和怪盗团一起行动也不会有宫殿，也真有可能觉醒面具），然后加一个比芳泽存在感高出许多的索菲，然后主线的各个boss和正作比较有区别，都不是真的大恶人，甚至可以说是只是和主角团队走上了不同路的英雄而已。而最后的boss其实和正传就很像了，说实话这一两年差不多要对这种主题要审美疲劳了，轨迹，传颂，p5等等都充斥着这种人定胜天的理念，只不过这个不涉及政治战争啥的所以就很正统王道热血，多的就不说了。

人设方面，旧的怪盗团基本都没啥区别，龙司毕竟这么长时间过去了也倒是不会令人讨厌了（毕竟一路上都在外面游玩），另外就是我老婆会长一如既往的靠谱，又成为了团队的司机，又担当做饭（善吉家），又要教小茜念书以及开导，真不知道这个团没了我老婆要怎么活下去。当然还是一如既往的怕鬼（怎么我老婆们好像都怕鬼，艾莉亚丽莎桂雏菊等等）。唯一有些ooc的就是大阪监狱了，显然这一大波人被抓都是为了善吉觉醒，但是这波人明知道是陷阱还是一波allin真实有点血压上升。
两个新角色，虽然一个是大叔一个是妹子但我确实觉得善吉塑造的更好一点，也有可能索菲的人设和摩纳有点重复的原因，摩纳也是一开始不知道自己是谁，然后一波波折离队，最后找回自我，没了。善吉呢毕竟是个社会人还是个警察，家里有个女儿，上司的上司有杀妻之仇，然后直接牵扯的社会的黑暗面，算是个非常丰满的人物，入队也合情合理，最后功成身退离开怪盗团各自奋斗，留下个成熟男人的背影。真的对比下来正传的新岛冴真的可惜，洗白以后的剧情太少了，还想多看一些后续交流，本作里出现了确实也起到了大作用，但毕竟都没和主角团碰上面，还想再多点戏份。另外的配角，小茜是为了塑造善吉的，一之濑是为了塑造索菲的就不多说了。

嘛总体来说，虽然游戏类型不一样，但是玩过p5或者p5r的玩家还是推荐玩玩本作，不追求成就一路easy过去爽快体验剧情也非常不错，想刷的也有东西可以二周目刷（饰品还有各种香之类），算是比较满足各类玩家需求的了。

PS；本作对我个人而言当然还有个最重要的地方，那就是环日本旅行。本身在日本五年多一直没啥机会出去玩，当然也有一部分疫情的原因，直到11月份快离开了才有机会和朋友去了一次京都，加上以前算是修学旅行去了一次大阪，然后就没去过什么地方了。本身和朋友约好的去北海道吃汤咖喱吃成吉思汗在游戏里实现了，真的是有些感慨，11月的那次旅行甚至当时想去圣地巡礼都不知道去哪里好，而p5本身的街道和风景啥的非常还原现实日本，涉谷比较熟悉自然不用说，其他札幌冲绳啥的以后也想再去看看到底有多还原。

author: 20602f15896c55059ef888015eabdefc
content:
P 5 正 统 续 作！
正经说一下优缺点吧
缺点主要是前期p等级，大师等级，band技能等级和补给限制导致一开始体验极差，输出刮痧，打两拨怪就要回家。还有就是后期迷宫有偷工减料的嫌疑。
优点当然是p系列属性克制系统和act玩法完美结合（众所周知脱裤魔除了做自己家无双不行代工什么无双都超神）；同时还有优秀的景点还原能力，游戏中场景我去过的只有大阪京都，还原到在哪拉过屎我都能想起来。也因此本作全篇下来真的有朋友们一起驾车全国旅行的真实感。

当然最大的优缺点肯定还是过于粉丝向，因为剧情是接的p5无印剧情，没有玩过p5的很难说为了游戏性玩下去。当然对于玩过p5的粉丝来说本作简直情怀拉满，我一开始回到爷那啤酒箱搭建的小床就热泪盈眶了。况且本作比p5r更好的继承了怪盗团伙伴的性格并加以补全，怪盗团的互动合理而有趣，即使刚玩完本篇也没有感到任何ooc的地方。

这里真的要吐槽下为啥本作是正统续作，我是真搞不懂p5r的第三学期不补全后入队小春的剧情，或者弥补龙哥逆天操作和言论，也没有增加怪盗团更多互动。天天惦记你那个不可能融入怪盗团的二五仔干嘛。还有花那么多篇幅以至于机械降神一个不可理喻和本篇boss格格不入的圣人老师，做的还一样和其他boss一样没啥区别的洗脑勾当。为了这两宁可崩了怪盗团的人设occ，多少有点不可理喻。甚至本来怪盗团高高兴兴一起送贼头回家的剧情都为了这两改成贼头一个人打车坐高铁回家。难受！
而p5s的成年人们在实打实的践行本篇许诺的大人的正义，可谓是格局打开。而对怪盗团本身成员人设也有了充分的补充。还有各种活动，景点的互动足以让本篇粉丝大呼过瘾。而这些可能才是作为一个刚玩完p5r就赶来玩p5s的玩家，想在p5续作里看到的吧。

总结一下：p5粉丝就算为了剧情也推荐必买（当然act苦手记得开简单难度）

author: 4ffcb9a53b7854d683913c2dbc33f2c4
content:
Gioco sequel di Persona 5 ( i fatti di royal sono ignorati), con gameplay totalmente differente ( non un musou puro, ma un misto tra RPG, hack `n slash e appunto musou). Decisamente divertente, anche se presenta poche attività di contorno e viene tolto il tempo scandito in giorni per incastrare il tutto. Viene presentato un game design piuttosto lineare e semplice da seguire, senza particolari difficoltà. 
Cosa importante: l`anima dei personaggi non viene intaccata in questo sequel, rimanendo estremamente fedele all` opera prequel
 Personalmente lo consiglio per tirare un po` di botte con i Ladri Fantasma

author: 8f47b1c741645b2ea792bbbf18d687ba
content:
I put this game off for the longest time because people kept telling me it's a Dynasty Warriors clone, and I hate Dynasty Warriors games. People on youtube like to perpetuate that it's a Dynasty Warriors clone as well.

I can assure you it's nothing of the sort. It's Persona 5 2 with action combat. It's also probably my favorite, and the best sequel to anything I've played in my near 30 years of playing videogames. 

I absolutely recommend this is you enjoyed P5/P5R and I'd love to see more games like this in the future. Happiest I've been playing a videogame in a very long time.

author: cf3a8d57f14f5c7db9d4c90dca2d98e7
content:
このようなレビューを書くのは初めてなので拙い文章になるかも知れませんがあしからず。
PS5R全クリの自分が、ゲーム開始から1時間で気に入った点と気になった点について書きます。


【気に入った点】
・フルボイスなこと
悠木碧とか宮野真守と杉田さんとか声優が豪華なだけあってフルボイスだとすっごく嬉しいよね。PS5Rはフルボイスじゃないこともあってここは特に嬉しかった。


【気になった点】
・PS5Rよりも作品全体のカッコよさが落ちてるように感じたこと
PS5Rでは総攻撃が特にそうだと思うんだけど、コミック風の作画を織り交ぜためっちゃセンス良いシーンが頻繫に見れたよね。
この作品でもその流れを汲み取ろうとしているのは分かるんだけど、どうにもパチモン感がある。（製作が違うんだからしょうがないとは思うんだけどね）こればかりは個人差ってレベルじゃなく完全に劣化していると思って貰っていい。


・ロードが長い
そこまで目くじら立てるレベルじゃないかもしれないが前作と比べると明らかに長い。（推奨環境以上のスペックでもちろん動かしています）


・すみれどこ行ったん；；
まだ1時間だから出てきてないとかじゃなくて、オープニング画面から完全に除外されてる；；
同じような髪色の新ヒロインだされても、すみれがちらついて集中できないよ…


・祐介が食いしん坊かつ、空気読めない発言ばかりするキ○ガイみたいになってること
大げさに書いているのは認めるが、「俺の肉を取り上げた異世界め…なます切りにしてやる！」みたいなことを言った時点で一度ゲーム切り上げてこのレビュー書き始めたのは事実。


ここまで書くと全然ダメな感じがしてくるけど、全体としては良いと思う。てかもう怪盗団の皆見れてるだけで割と満足。
セール価格で買ったので、フルボイスで怪盗団の会話聞くゲームだと割り切れればめっちゃ買いだと思います。

author: 5a48ed6fa1d559e186a2e27e3da5dfd2
content:
玩的是主机版的，所以直接搬一下来这边

玩了10个小时的体验，发句暴言：战斗系统真的是依托答辩。

要不是剧情依然很P5无印味道加上我有粉丝滤镜根本没法忍这么久。Omega Force参与开发结果做得像个动作新手，稀烂的手感和混乱的战斗我当在玩KH3呢。视野外杂兵顶你屁股就算了，杂兵个个韧性高的一笔，杂兵读条技能无法被平A打断，被蹭到1到2个克制技能就进异常，这时候周围要是有杂兵的话就可以直接放下手柄等死了。

OF还搬自己做得最熟的无双系列的那套C系统过来，我都看笑了，敌人硬直最多够你搓个C3，搓个C5的时间够对面5个灯笼搓10个火球，满血直接被秒，10个要是真全中了你还得倒欠杂兵2管血。
也就最后队友死光杂兵清光之后，我和boss单挑的时候可以打得有来有回——虽然这个“有来有回”也不好界定：我打boss是刮痧，boss打我一个技能摸到就是三分之一管血，不过好歹我看得清技能范围可以躲。平常战斗时候自己技能特效、三个队友技能特效、boss技能特效、杂兵技能特效和满地蟑螂一样多的杂兵模型混在一起谁看得到技能指示圈？
混战打一半脚底突然出个圈，吃到个永眠睡下了，狂搓摇杆也起不来还是被杂兵技能打醒，打醒之后从睡眠变冻结，三秒吃了个五个状态异常，我都看笑了。

还做割草游戏，制作组能不能先讨论好哪边当草啊？打无双好歹是我是一把镰刀周围杂兵都是草，这破游戏我才是草，周围几十把镰刀还一直刷新，你还搁那搓□□□□△呢，背后杂兵直接给你菊花来一下打断让你白搓。不会做动作赶紧跪着去学卡普空爹行不行啊，玩之前看这作评价还挺高还挺期待的，现在我属实是想不明白了，也许大家都是玩的EASY吧。

之前我还一直觉得学妹作为R新角色没法上P5S很遗憾，现在真的是庆幸还好没上。好了骂完了舒服了，等整个打完再继续说。

author: 3f53ce3ee3085cf2942076291c84c8c9
content:
Una innecesaria pero increíble secuela del Persona 5 vanilla. Una lástima que no haya contenido de su versión mejorada, Persona 5 Royal, pero tampoco es algo muy importante. Si jugaste los dos anteriores que mencioné, probablemente te guste mucho esta secuela, la adaptación del gameplay es realmente sorprendente, mantiene su único estilo, cada ladrón fantasma es tiene su propia mecánica, acción pura, y ni que decir de la banda sonora, los remix de las canciones originales son de otro mundo, es agarrar a un boss, que suene Last surprise remix y querer cagarte a palos con todo el mundo. 
En cuanto a dificultad, te puede castigar bastante el que no aproveches las mecánicas que te ofrece, no es solo reventar el teclado/joystick, hay muchísimos enemigos, los bosses tienen mucha vida y algunos te pueden oneshotear, y he de admitir que la exploración de las cárceles es un poco más incómodo comparado al Royal/Vanilla, los personajes se sienten un poco más lentos y no hay muchos spots para esconderse como en los juegos anteriores, pero te terminas acostumbrando. También, una diferencia con el juego anterior, casi ni te tenés que preocupar por el tiempo, ni al salir y entrar de la cárcel, ya que las fechas avanzan junto con la historia y al no haber social links ni estadística social que subir, no hay razón para que pase. 
La cantidad de contenido no es tan abrumadora como los juegos anteriores, ya que este no posee social links y la parte de visual novel está bastante menos trabajada (SPOILER: ni se dignaron a hacerle modelo a Sae que se menciona y aparece un par de veces), la historia es entretenida, terminarla te deja una sensación similar (no tan cercana) a cuando terminas el juego original.
Y otro punto malo, y el más importante, los controles de teclado y mouse son horribles, es muy recomendable jugarlo con joystick. 
Nada más que agregar, si jugaste los personas anteriores, 100% recomendado darle oportunidad a este, no te va a decepcionar :) (en caso contrario no porque probablemente no entiendas un pingo XD)

author: 3f9b5f37df065d3294da3cfce711567a
content:
我是玩完p5r再来的p5s，先说一下我的感受吧，首先在剧情上是可以接上的，p5s也经常在剧情里回忆起p5r的内容，说实话我还是挺感动的，主要是每一处提起前作的内容的时候都很恰到好处，没有违和感，喜欢剧情的小伙伴可以放心食用。
其次是玩法上，虽然和p5r的玩法大不相同，初始键位也比较反人类，但是改成p5r的键位之后就会很舒服，让我比较不习惯的是风格，p5r的风格就很有怪盗的味道，偷偷潜入，来去如风，这才是我心中的怪盗，在p5s里面打个怪一下子蹦出来一堆怪。。。。感觉没有怪盗的味道了。
然后是我比较喜欢的日常，p5s虽然延续了p5r的日常风格，而且给玩家带来了环游日本的豪华体验，但是总感觉丢失了p5r那种很平常很温馨的日常，有点空洞，不过值得庆幸的是对主角团的刻画很明显，基本上都是围绕主角团展开，不像p5r有大量的人际关系，对主角团的整体影响略微有点大（忙着开后宫呢谁管你打不打怪）。
然后还有面具。。p5s面具不仅数量大减。。。而且提升属性变成比较直观的花点数来提升，并且没有龙司的瞬杀导致不管是刷级还是刷钱都比较慢，还没有警报。。。。。啊啊啊，p5r综合征又犯了！！！
总体来说我个人认为p5s还是比较适合玩过p5或者p5r的人来休闲体验的，毕竟这一作整体比较轻松，时间跨度也不大，但是带来的体验绝对不差，我个人的话还是比较喜欢p5r，不喜勿喷！！球球了！！！

author: 2f27b304388b5935b223d090fa55f256
content:
[長文慎入]

 今日有款遊戲想介紹下，呢款遊戲就係Atlus同光榮製作組Omega Force合作製作嘅一款無雙類遊戲，女神異聞錄5嘅後續作品，「女神異聞錄5 亂戰：魅影攻手」。老實講其實我不嬲都唔係咁鍾意無雙類遊戲，嗰種割草式嘅戰鬥方式我就唔係咁識欣賞，不過早幾年任天堂同Omega Force 合作製作嘅災厄啟示錄，呈現嘅效果相當之理想 ，就令我對呢個製作團隊有返啲信心。玩完P5R之後見P5S都有特價，作為鍾意呢部作品嘅玩家，緊係要體驗埋佢嘅後續故事啦。

  玩完之後，呢款遊戲同本傳一樣都係咁正。作為一款無雙遊戲，呢款遊戲嘅故事性同P5一樣依然都係咁重，劇情同埋角色我都幾鍾意。有別於以往無雙系列嘅戰鬥系統，創新嘅戰鬥系統有好有唔好，我就覺得都唔錯嘅。美術風格都係咁靚，配樂仲係咁有水準。雖然呢款遊戲嘅規模、內容量都冇P5咁大，不過玩嘅時候我都仲係咁享受，呢款遊戲嘅整體表現我都滿意。

  咁首先等我介紹下呢款遊戲嘅劇情啦，今集就發生喺P5故事完咗之後半年後嘅暑假(留意返今集並冇承繼P5R嘅劇情)，心之怪盜團藉住呢個暑假再次聚舊，而日本全國各地都發生大量嘅悔改事件，日本各國唔少地區都出現，名為監獄嘅神秘異空間，原本諗住好好享受呢個假期嘅心之怪盜團，就決定重出江湖，喺呢個暑假解決日本各地發生嘅悔改事件，順便嚟返一轉日本環國遊，咁到底心之怪盜團喺呢個暑假會遇到啲咩事？悔改事件同埋監獄呢個異空間背後又有啲咩真相？如有興趣就可以自己買嚟體驗下啦。今集嘅故事量雖然就冇P5咁長(大約30至40個鐘就玩得完)，不過今集嘅故事依然係咁有意思同埋誠意，睇住呢班熟悉嘅心之怪盜團再次聚舊，環遊唔少日本知名嘅景點，加上唔少P5留落嚟嘅劇情梗，相信唔少同我一樣鍾意P5嘅玩家，今集都會睇得好過癮(冇玩過P5玩家，我會建議玩咗先玩P5S，因為今集係會直接透過對話，劇透返P5嘅重要情節，冇玩過P5嘅玩家，直接玩今集代入感應該會相差好遠)。今集嘅劇情發展都唔會話好意外、驚喜， 不過睇住一班熟識得嚟又咁喜愛嘅角色，加上精彩嘅情節，今集嘅劇本我都係睇到好滿足、好滿意。

 呢款遊戲有唔少嘅角色都好吸引，唔少角色我都幾鍾意，怪盜團每一位成員都仲係咁好睇，不過我就唔特別講解怪盜團成員啦，我主要想講就係 S版嘅兩位新角色。大叔刑警善吉相當之討好，雖然同怪盜團年齡上有一對定嘅差距，不過感覺一啲都唔突兀，各種吐槽式嘅互動相當之好笑，呢個角色亦都好有型、好有義氣，呢個角色我都幾鍾意。而Ai女角蘇菲亞都好可愛，睇住佢由當初乜都唔識慢慢逐漸成熟，睇住佢嘅成長，都幾好睇。今集其餘嘅配角都唔錯，不過可惜嘅就係P5大部分配角喺P5S都冇登場。今集唔少嘅反派都係描寫得好好，同P5唔同，每個反派都唔係大奸大惡嘅壞人，每一個都有各自值得同情嘅經歷，與其話每一個章節嘅反派都係每件事件嘅加害者，其實某程度上嚟講佢哋都係被害者。

  而家等我介紹下呢款遊戲嘅玩法啦，每個章節玩家進入監獄嘅時候，都需要同唔同陰影(敵人)戰鬥，而今集嘅戰鬥系統就同以往無雙系列嘅戰鬥系統好唔同，今集嘅戰鬥系統可以話係將無雙嘅戰鬥系統同埋女神異聞錄戰鬥系統嘅特色放埋一齊，玩家喺監獄戰鬥嘅時候，可以操縱主角或者其他怪盜團嘅成員，使用唔同嘅武器同陰影戰鬥，而戰鬥過程中隨時都可以召喚人格面具，使用各種技能。由於呢款遊戲嘅戰鬥系統想同以往無雙戰鬥系統作出區别，亦想呈現返女神異聞錄戰鬥系統帶俾人嘅感覺，所以呢款遊戲都鼓勵玩家，使用對應嘅屬性技能去對付各種嘅敵人，從而令敵人進行力竭狀態，不過都因為遊戲鼓勵玩家使用多啲技能，變相普通攻擊嘅攻擊力就低好多，遇到普通敵人嘅時候，呢個情況都冇太大問題，但當玩家遇到精英怪或者Boss嘅時候，就可能因為唔夠Sp放唔到足夠嘅技能，或者帶錯隊友，之後就要用普通攻擊打好耐，先打敗倒呢啲敵人，變相就搞倒好難打，初頭玩嗰陣就覺得，無雙系統同女神異聞錄戰鬥系統兩者融合之下，平衡性就唔係咁好，啱啱玩個陣真係好唔慣，不過玩家又唔洗太擔心遊玩體驗，隨住劇情進展，以及各種支線任務解鎖到嘅技能，加上各種強勁嘅人格面具，都可以解決到Sp唔夠同埋戰鬥系統平衡性嘅問題，唔少玩家都應該可以同我一樣喺中後期開始，慢慢享受倒猶如無雙般嘅戰鬥爽度、同埋技能分配上嗰種資源管理嘅樂趣。呢款遊戲嘅戰鬥系統可以話有好有唔好，呈現嘅效果坦白講都未如理想，不過都好樂於見倒製作團隊嘗試製作一款融合有女神異聞錄風格嘅無雙遊戲，玩嘅時候都感受倒製作團隊嘅誠意。今集嘅監獄雖然就冇P5嘅殿堂咁有趣，頭三個監獄玩落都有啲重複，不過每一個監獄整體嘅表現我覺得都唔錯嘅。由於呢款遊戲每個章節並冇時間上嘅限制，日子流逝嘅系統都取消咗，亦因為咁今集並冇女神異聞錄系列嘅日常系統，冇得同同伴、其他配角增進友誼，呢點就有啲可惜。

  呢款遊戲嘅美術風格我都幾鍾意，角色嘅造型設計同埋服裝設計都好靚。今集新增嘅監獄更係將日本著名景點嘅特色呈現出嚟，同時又融合倒每個章節嘅主題，雖然監獄嘅地圖設計上就冇殿堂咁花巧，不過都感受倒製作團體嘅心思。今次P5S同P5一樣，啲音樂都係咁正、咁有水準，雖然P5S唔少配樂喺P5有出現過，但製作團體並冇直接資源再用，反而係同一首配樂重新編曲，配上其他嘅樂器演奏，所以就算係P5熟悉嘅配樂，聽起上嚟都有别一番風味。而今集新嘅配樂同樣都係咁正，遊戲嘅主題曲You are Stronger都好好聽。

  總括嚟講，呢款遊戲係幾正嘅，不論劇情定係角色我都好鍾意，創新嘅戰鬥系統有好有唔好，我覺得都唔錯，美術風格好靚，配樂依然咁有水準，雖然呢款遊戲有比較明顯嘅缺點，但係都冇阻佢優秀嘅表現，呢款遊戲我都幾推薦，特別推薦俾鍾意女神異聞錄5嘅粉絲嘗試一下。

author: 29f7726d6bd45a0684909bfe4b77789a
content:
[h1] 無双だと食わず嫌いをしていたが紛れもないペルソナだった [/h1]

-P５本編無印、ROYALクリア済

・コーエーテクモの無双チームとのコラボで作られたP５無印の続編
・完全な続編なのでP5本編（ROYALではない無印）をクリアしてからプレイすることを強く推奨
・どうせ草刈りゲーでしょ…？と食わず嫌いをしていて長らくやってなかったが紛れもないペルソナだった
・逆に言うと無双要素は雑魚が大量に出るのとコマンド入力くらいしかないので無双好きの人にはイマイチかもしれない
・弱点をついて１moreを取ったり弱点属性を突かれると雑魚にも殺されるような感じでペルソナ感がある
・ペルソナを合体して強化したりできるしやり込もうと思えばお気に入りのペルソナを強化する事も可能
・ジョーカーだけではなく他のキャラクターも使える
・無双というよりは雑魚が多いアクションRPGと言った感じのゲーム
・序盤は中ボス固くね…？という感じだがペルソナが揃ってくると弱点とバフデバフを積むと面白いように削れる
・簡単な難易度も用意されているのでアクション苦手でも多分大丈夫
・新キャラクター、ストーリーが非常に良く本編より良いまである
・新キャラの一人が弱点のない万能なキャラでコイツだけ夏侯惇のような無双っぽい動きができる
・P5本編と違いSP回復アイテムが豊富、アイテムでゴリ押しもできてしまうのでそのへんは適宜縛りプレイするのもありかも
・無双を期待するとズコーとなるがペルソナを期待するなら大いにあり

author: 5d9e54e48a9752e7960b812485c72e50
content:
战斗系统很糟糕，因为数值设计很奇葩，刮痧太严重，根本带不来任何爽感。无双游戏？被无双！战斗花里胡哨，看似每个角色有很多组合连技，但是，这些连技发动都要花很长时间，普攻-普攻-特殊攻击，然后中了一个不知道哪里飞来的“芙拉”死翘翘，连技纯纯鸡肋，因为敌人伤害高得离谱。不给敌人上减攻，不给自己上防增，基本没法玩。
这游戏正确的战斗方式只有一种，瞄准敌人弱点死命放技能。弱点伤害达到一定数值后就能打断敌人动作，触发追击打断，继续放技能，根本不给敌人行动的机会。SP用完了就换角色，都用光了SP就嗑药。当然不可能每场战斗都这样耗下去，大范围高伤的物理伤害用来清理杂鱼，虽然代价是消耗很多的HP，怪盗团们打一场架能吃20个大汉堡，贴40个OK绷，还好怪盗团们很讲素质不乱丢垃圾，不然每场战斗后满地的饭盒。
可惜只有二周目可以这样玩。因为一周目经验值获取效率太低，几乎不可能在一周目就刷到最强的几种面具：义经，爱丽丝，路西法.....二周目中期开始，逐渐解锁强力的面具，战斗流程就变成了：女巫诅咒、加攻、加防、加速、蓄力、八艘跳、蓄力、八艘跳、蓄力、八艘跳........很多强力BOSS找准弱点后，已经无脑无伤过了。总得来说，只有在二周目时战斗才有爽感，但这些爽感更像是一种宣泄，因为一周目时被打得满地爪牙。本质上还是战斗数值太夸张，战斗容错率低，只能最求最高效率的输出方式。当情绪宣泄完后，只会感到厌倦，想让坐牢赶快结束。
为什么要把战斗做得这么折磨人？因为只能靠战斗来拖时长，游戏流程真的太短了。怪盗团们的暑假过得太快了，想更多地看怪盗团们的故事，但任务系统太简陋，很多支线剧情事件只有对话，没有演出。意犹未尽？更多失望吧。P5S，如果它不是怪盗团们的故事，这种品质的游戏拿出来，因为太烂连让人喷的劲头都没有。我给他好评，是因为他延续了怪盗团们的故事。如果还有下次，请好好做吧。

author: dcb353d963995f77b4effa6444909e88
content:
Pros:
Persona 5 continuity.
Decent story.
Great characters (well it is Persona 5)
Koei Tecmo's "X Warriors" style game play.
Game generally is fun, jokes also nice and funny and makes you laugh.
Musics.

Cons:
Your story on Persona 5 feels forgotten (for example your romantic interest or people connected with you)
Repeating game play (well it is "X Warriors" style series anyway)
Not good keyboard layout even you change keyboard mapping still not good.
Dificulty is not "Normal" it feels "Hard" even in Normal Difficulty choice. Maybe it is also effects of "X Warriors" series from Koei Tecmo/Omega Force.

Still if you wanted to see what happens after some time your "Persona 5 (Royal)" story and also if you like "X Wariors" series like myself you can play it without worry. But better buy it with discount and don't expect "Persona 5 (Royal)" kind of deep story.

author: 0708b7eabbee519eab6c3a069a6f76ff
content: I was really excited to play this after playing Royal and I really wish I could give this game a positive review because from what I was able to play I enjoyed it. However the game is not ported properly for PC and you're constantly going to be crashing out. I've tried all the advice I could find online but haven't been able to make this game run reliably without breaking. I'm down to play if they fix this mess but in it's current state it doesn't run well on higher end computers. I have an intel i9 12900k, a 3080 and 32 gbs of ram and if I don't increase the games priority to high and adjust the apps affinity to be able to use all CPU cores it will stutter and freeze even on the pre-rendered opening cut scenes. Very disappointed I can't play because I was looking forward to this game. Fix the game and I'd be happy to recommend.

author: 095a2ac49cb95d4aad73329d761dbc8b
content:
i love persona 5 so naturally playing its sequel was something i really wanted to do and while i havent finished it yet i feel like ive put enough time to have an opinion

the gameplay is awesome, they got everything that makes persona 5 what it is and somehow converted it into a completely different genre, the music is also really good and really fits [tho some are reused] however i will now list the technical issues this game has that ive noticed so far 

the audio mixing is really bad. sometimes the music is too loud, sometimes theres this weird reverb on th dialogue making them really hard to hear, sometimes the voices are so quiet you cant hear them all 

the optimization is wonky, i couldnt get AA to work without having to open my gpu control panel to fix it, if you run this game at 60 fps which lets be honest you will and the frame rate drops at any point, instead of the frame rate actually dropping the game just  slows down... literally and ironically that makes some fights extremely difficult as input lag also goes up as the game slows down 

the controls are great.. with a controller, do not play this game with mouse and keyboard its truly awful 

however i still really recommend this game, its lots of fun even with its issues

author: 84f8ca5a76c0501aba58e9030d75a768
content:
[h1]12/10，P5的完美续作[/h1]，对主题的升华，将原本慢节奏的jrpg变为了更加爽快的类无双类游戏。剧情上承接p5本传，讲述了怪盗团一行人暑期重聚之后一边旅行一边再度拯救世界的故事。
   4个大迷宫，2个小迷宫，以及两个终局场景，本作的内容可以说相当充足。 如果对无双系统不熟悉的玩家推荐一周目简单或者普通难度开局，游戏难度并不会影响剧情。如果没玩过p5又不喜欢玩传统jrpg的可以考虑看p5的番剧或者看一下p5的游戏录像了解剧情之后再进行游玩。
    本作相比于无双其实更像一个arpg游戏，在动作方面，相比传统jrpg重复的释放技能，玩家实际操作角色自然更有代入感，一周目正常难度下玩家的操作可以使得战斗的情况大为不同，利用好闪避、反击，幻影移动攻击以及场地上可互动的道具可以使得战斗更加轻松；而rpg方面，合理的配置也会对战斗体验产生显著影响，选择合适的p和队友能够有效提高游玩体验，如果发现战斗很吃力建议及时练级和更新装备，如果你的角色强度足够那就是你无双怪，而如果角色太弱就变成怪无双你了。
    个人体验本作的操作相比原作有不少优化，无论是可以用摇杆选择选项以及更合理的键位都让我的体验有了不小提升，玩完p5s再回去玩p5r甚至有些不适。
    本作的故事线仅有一个多月的长度，因此内容非常紧凑，但内容依然非常充足。主线故事承接p5无印结局，大约有原版一半的长度，在续写的基础上加入了各个boss的过往故事和怪盗团的反思，也是整个故事推进的重要线索。新角色[spoiler] 真正的红毛女主 [/spoiler]索菲娅的加入对怪盗团的成长起了很大作用，cv久野美咲的卖力演出也为终章剧情大大加分。而原作大量的日常内容在本作中一部分被融入了主线故事中，一部分则是各个城市的日常对话和支线任务中，主角团之间的羁绊故事依旧，各个角色的塑造也更加丰满，尤其是[spoiler] 我的本命[/spoiler]春在本传中入队过晚戏份偏少，而本作中则不存在入队先后导致剧情量不同的问题。温泉回，浴池回，花火回应有尽有，很能满足玩家的胃口。比较可惜的是原作的羁绊人物在本作仅有老板惣治郎登场，另有一个客串角色不过连立绘都没有，只有cv的几句台词。
    游戏机制方面，本作则体现了光荣优秀的外包能力，[spoiler] 自家游戏我唯唯诺诺，外包内容我重拳出击[/spoiler]在无双的基础上融入了p5的机制，类似于大蛇无双系列，主人公将与至多三名队友一同探索与战斗，玩家操作的角色也可随时替换。迷宫行动中依然保留了潜行机制，由于幻影移动的加入，迷宫的探索变得更加顺畅，而无双中的军团战斗则以由暗影触发的小规模战斗代替，类似于gba上的三国无双a？战斗方面在继承了无双的C技系统上加入了枪械以及人格面具系统，原本的无双变为了整个区域的showtime，旋风连击则被1more和总攻击代替。战斗中可以随时随地时停使用道具或召唤人格面具释放技能，也可通过追击，反击或对应C技来释放persona。属性克制和technical机制依然得到保留。各个角色的武器模组固定但各有特色，而Joker则可根据所使用P的不同释放不同的persona技能。区域内也存在有可互动的道具来辅助战斗，尤其是各个boss战，场地上都会有相当多的道具与boss进行机制交互，合理利用可以使你的战斗更加轻松。
    本作的人格面具系统相比原版大为简化，面具由击败的敌人概率掉落，天鹅绒房间仅保留了合成以及对面具升级强化的功能，你所能合成的p大多数都是一路会遇到的敌人，除最终p之外各个p最大的区别可能就是使用C技时释放的技能不同，比如我一周目很喜欢用的p娜迦之王的C2EX会释放群体提高暴击闪避率，C3会释放范围高伤害电击，C5EX则为大范围电击。一周目对于p的需求并不高，选择喜欢的就行，而如果打通关后的刚魔或者打二周目risky难度（美版为merciless难度）则对p有较高要求。
    本作的音乐也极为优秀，原创曲以及对原作中经典曲目的remix与本作融合的恰到好处，其中daredevil个人认为是只属于p5s的“偷心神曲”，各个迷宫独特的曲风也给玩家带来不同的感觉，而remix的rivers in the desert也出现在大boss战中为紧张的战斗增色。
    虽然吹了这么多，但是这作还有一些我个人不是很满意的地方，首先是画质问题，由于本作为无双+ns发售，导致画质略不尽人意，即使全高也会有很明显的锯齿影响体验，渲染拉高稍有缓解；游戏中的普攻威力显得偏弱了，即使在一周目普通的C技清怪和输出能力都不如追加释放的persona技能，导致大部分时候都在重复用几个C技，缺乏无双技和生存能力强的C技导致战斗基本上是靠闪避绕着圈打，虽然打起来还是很爽就是了；某些异常状态作用在角色身上过强了，会让玩家直接倒地不可控，此时被敌人追击很容易被打出tech直接离场，必须要用道具解，而游戏中的大量道具并没有分类需要一个个翻，很影响战斗节奏。还有一点比较小的地方是迷宫中角色的对话和双叶的提示是在画面右上角的，在战斗中很难分心去关注。
    总而言之，本作作为P5的续作非常优秀，即使没玩过p5的玩家也可以体验剧情，而p5的老玩家则可以继续享受那个美好的属于高中生的童话时光。在高质量续写了p5的剧情的基础上对游戏机制进行了很大革新，给玩家带来全新的体验。同时为女神异闻录5的故事画下了新的句点。

author: d350e2c1f3e75f0ca43777febf06efb9
content:
与P5R类似的单元剧+最后的主线，流程更短剧情更紧凑，使得剧情观感优于P5R。尤其是大叔的人物塑造，即使算上R也算最完整立体的。

但是这套毫无乐趣的战斗系统以及为了强行增加游戏时间的三重关卡设计，自动进入战斗的堆怪模式，以及明明可以安全屋回血却非要恶心你，让你重新加载这臭不可闻的迷宫的设计逻辑，

除了玩法硬伤还要给你60帧超大锯齿/场景掉帧/瞎眼粗繁体字/等粗暴移植。

总结起来，是P5玩家不得不吃的巧克力味shit，令人感到相当疲倦的游戏旅程

author: 4403b459c2a5515aa83aadb726260bf3
content:
Did you enjoy Persona 5? Persona 5 Royal? 
Strikers is a beautiful continuation of 5 from the combat system that differs from the Persona series' norm to the new and familiar faces we see along our road trip across Japan. 
I thought it was interesting that they chose to go the Musou route for a spin-off but it was definitely the right direction to take the game in. It has 10x the personality that Arena Ultimax has and nothing feels better than mowing down mountains of shadows in one fell swoop. 
Don't even get me going on the soundtrack. If you weren't fed enough bangers while playing through 5 or Royal *do not fret* the team has your back and is here to supply you with *even more bangers*. They will spoon feed them to you until you explode from the amount of fire tracks you receive in one sitting.
Take a chance, take your time. You may be surprised with what you find.

author: 0c68d8bef0a953ec98e2a9fa05610d60
content:
P5的正统续作，玩完P5R意犹未尽的，一定要入这作。
这作剧情是承接的原版P5，没有明智，丸喜和芳泽霞。但在此作也新增了两个主要人物，刻画的比那b明智好一万倍。
剧情在第三个监狱以后一路走高，可以用平开高走来形容了。
此作推进剧情的方式是只依靠事件推动主线进行的而并非P5R里的日期推动主线。也就是说周可儿一天能干超过两件事了！！！
唯一的缺点就是本作的字体看起来比较糊，需要适应一段时间。而且游戏画面人物的锯齿挺严重的，游戏内调节画质没啥效果，最好要在N卡控制面板里调节。调节之后会好很多。以下是我调的参数，大家可以根据自己的配置参考一下

各向异性过滤                        16X
平滑处理                             （FXAA）开
平滑处理模式                        提高应用程序设置
平滑处理设置                        8X
平滑处理透明度                     8X（超级取样）
纹理过滤-三线性优化             开
纹理过滤-各项异性采样优化   关
纹理过滤-负LOD偏移             锁定
纹理过滤-质量                        高质量

author: e6335c8ed4645ab9a127a4987d2974f8
content:
-매우 좋은 페르소나5 외전- 
페르소나5 로얄 2회차 200시간 정도 플레이했고 너무 재밌어서 후속작도 할인해서 구매했습니다.
페르소나5 로얄은 제가 해본 최고의 턴알피지였습니다.

전투는 콤보를 잘 쳐서 패턴을 끊으면 재밌고 아니면 그저그런 겜이라 3스테이지는 가야 대충 감이 잡힐겁니다.
전투가 애매했는데 재미있는 구간도 있어서 전투 부분은 호불호가 갈릴 수 있습니다.

스토리 부분이 대단하고 앤딩을 다보고 놀랐습니다.
페르소나 5를 재미있게 즐기신 분이라면 추천할 수 있습니다.
페르소나5의 스토리는 이 작품으로 완성됩니다.

author: 84027ea157f4545db6dbfafb469c7724
content:
Ist auf jeden Fall ein schönes Spiel mit ein Actionreiches-Kampfsystem. Die Story ist ok im Vergleich zu Royal, aber nicht ganz so gut. Zur Grafik brauche ich denke nicht viel zu sagen, aber die Musik ist echt top, einziger Nachteil, sie ist nicht immer sehr abwechslungsreich.
Was mich persönlich gestört hat, waren die „Gefängnisse“, da diese eigentlich immer nach Schema F abliefen, es war immer das gleich. Man geht rein, geht zu den Türmen, hol die Schätze und öffne damit den Eingang zum Boss, ende!
Alles in allen kann man Persona 5 Strikers spielen, wenn man Royal gespielt hat, aber man verpasst jetzt auch nicht wirklich was, wenn man es nicht spielt.
Wertung: 7/10

author: 9c274211a3b25ea4b20f6f430d4c0874
content:
This game is a direct-sequel to Persona 5 Vanilla (And semi-sequel to Royal's bonus content, but not needed). 

Strikers takes place the summer after Persona 5 ended. Everyone's on Summer Break, and it becomes a roadtrip of the good ol' Persona variety. The game implements the mechanics of Dynasty Warriors and Persona 5 itself very nicely, with the UI being heavily stylized via Persona, and the mechanics mixing the two to a satisfying degree. 

If you're a fan of Persona 5, I'd still pick it up even if you don't necessarily enjoy Dynasty Warrior games, since the story and gameplay both feel very well tuned to Persona.

author: 28f9bd6931465f04bdfd09418691dd87
content:
Having never played a musou type game before and being on the fence of getting this i saw the game only costed 24 dollars and decided to get it. I wanted to write an early review of what i thought about the game if anyone else was on the fence of getting it so i played for about 6 hours to get a general feel, before going in i knew there wasn't social links and i was fine with that but if your looking for that kinda stuff its not here really

Now this review is from the stand point of having never played a musou game but i can say this game is very fun for me it might be terrible from a mosou veterans stand point but honestly your probably only playing this if your a fan of persona in the first place

As a disclaimer I played with a controller since the MK controls seemed awful 
The combat is real time all out brawls while being surrounded by shadows but the actual combat boils down to basically pressing X and then Y for a finisher which is usually your personas ability which is FREE to do without SP. Which is amazing because SP drains fast in this game if your manually casting spells. And this game lets you play as any of the phantom thieves (besides akechi and yoshizawa) i found my self playing more as the other characters then Joker but i mostly played ryuji so i could dream of punt kicking that stupid cat into outer space. Each character has a very unique fighting style and move set (idk about morgona i haven't touched him) that encompass their persona,gun and melee weapons into their rushes and attacks ruji can charge up his attacks and his base Y makes him harder to flinch Ann and mokoto can imbue their weapons with their personas elements yusuke has parries and haru has massive aoes. There's also two new persona users shown off in the games opening cut scene one joined the phantom thieves at the first hour of game play and she uses yoyos shes pretty fun but there's another guy i saw using a persona in the opening cut scene of the game idk if he joins or is an antagonist though 

If you played P5R you probably blew through the game without much trouble besides that dam space palace. So I came into this game expecting it to be easy so i cranked the difficulty up to hard and I was very wrong, It was actually hard for me even on normal to my surprise. Still i only have 6 hours so maybe this is just early game woes mixed with having never played a mosou before

Another point is that the game pretty much mandates a day 1 clear. To my surprise you could leave the palace and time wont progress at all, so i would drain my SP and HP leave buy some healing fuse personas ECT come back and be ready to go.

One Con i have so far is that characters that are not being played by you do not receive master arts XP which isn't to bad for the 4 people you really like considering you'll be using them often. but if you go against a boss say weak to nuclear and fire but don't use Ann or Mokoto at all your kinda outa luck because not only are they under leveled for not being in the party but they also dont have all their master arts compared to your main 4. so far this has been my only gripe with the game

author: 788f1c10b17954a5ad3899cbbc4f2d73
content:
Ugh.... I guess I'll review it. I loved P4G and P5R as the first disclaimer, and I'm not much for JRPGs. So this is the hack and slash "sequel" to P5. And I don't hate it? I'm not sure if I like it because it's P5 content or how it plays (despite it taking two attempts to get into it). If you really, really want more from the P5 Story go for it. If Japanese hack and Slash are your thing... go for it. If you are just coming to terms that you might have a thing for JRPGs.... I dunno... try it out. It's not bad just very, very different. And it is disconnected from the canon in the weirdest ways. Most of that can be explained that it got made at the same time as P5R by a different Studio and they had no idea. All in all it's a P5 hack and Slash that furthers the story and it has no technical faults. So i guess I recommend it but tbh I am not sure if I like this game or not.... Which you probably experience as well.

Well I'm done with the game, "For real" this time. I have to say, that while the Gameplay didn't do it for me, I'd happily play through it again. Because as disconnected the story is from P5R, it's entirely good on it's own. There are more moments that moved me to tears, which is kinda hard to do, than there were in P5R. So It might not be a real Persona game, but it does it's very best to live up to one and I really hope that at least Sophia comes back in P6.

author: 85d828ee33cf55d5b6fa8d8dca8c20b8
content:
Persona 5 Strikers is a fantastic game. It takes a lot to get used to for players new to Musou games, but I find it strikes a perfect balance between the hoard-clearing action of Musou and the RPG elements of Persona. 

To start off, the story is fantastic. The newest additions to the Phantom Thieves, Sophia (Sophie) and Zenkichi (Wolf) are incredibly lovable with great motivations of their own. I also found myself adoring Kuon Ichinose quite a lot, to boot. Some of the previous members of the Phantom Thieves get some amazing moments and further development during their spotlighted moments in the story, which makes this game's story even more exciting to witness.

The gameplay, as stated earlier, strikes a fine line between a Warriors game and a Persona game. You'll have your standard elemental attacks, buff skills, recovery skills, etc. Targeting weaknesses breaks shields that lead to All Out Attacks, which are possibly even better in Strikers than in the source material. 
SP management is pretty crucial early game, but the further you get in the story the easier it gets. You can leave a Jail (Strikers' version of Palaces) at any time and get a full HP and SP restore for absolutely free with no day advancement at all, so SP items are mostly relegated to boss fights.
I originally didn't enjoy the game all that much as I played it very button mashy, like I did playing Warriors games growing up- but this isn't the ideal way to play. Each Persona has combo skills assigned to different attack combos, for example the square square triangle triangle combo for Pixie casts Dia. You might wonder how this is useful and different at all to manually casting the skills, and that's where combo skills truly shine. Combo Skills are completely free, provided you can do the combo. This makes mid and late game Personas a blast, as they can let you cast Magarudynes and Matarukajas for 0 SP! It really made the combat feel unique and especially enjoyable.

I also like the Request feature in this game and how many Requests can be unlocked in each area by just talking to your teammates during certain moments in the story. It added more reason to explore each new area and find all the dialogue options.

Possible spoiler warning ahead, as I'll discuss how this game handles New Game+.
[spoiler] New Game+ is unlocked differently in Strikers compared to Persona 5/Persona 5 Royal- instead of unlocking it automatically after defeating the final boss and seeing the end credits, doing the same in Strikers gives you the "DONE!" note next to your save data. A "DONE!" Save File will place you just before the final boss, with additional Requests to defeat each boss in the game in a more powerful and properly leveled state. After defeating all the bosses again at their higher levels, you must also defeat all the Dire Shadows, which are powerful enemies Oracle advises you to avoid when you spot them. After doing all of that, you must defeat The Reaper, who is the final obstacle in your way before New Game+. I quite enjoy this unique take on unlocking New Game+, as it is earned moreso than handed to the player, and properly prepares them for the New Game+ exclusive difficulty, Merciless. In Merciless, even common enemies can withstand full assaults from Personas with max 99 in every single stat- it's amazing! [/spoiler]

In short, this game is fantastic and a must buy for fans of Persona 5's cast. If you can learn the combat systems, you'll find a fantastic treat of a game with delightful additions to the roster and great character moments for some of the lesser loved Phantom Thieves.

content: 先来个差评吧，进游戏一直卡顿掉帧没法玩，还以为是我设置有问题。这里统一回复一下各位用12代的玩家们，游戏卡顿掉帧不是你们的问题，这个游戏没有做12代u的小核心优化，打开游戏默认是用小核心再玩，但是小核心带不起来，所以就会出现一直卡顿的现象。解决办法很简单，重启进入bios界面，关闭小核心，然后保存重启即可，亲测有效，祝各位高配置玩家玩的愉快

author: 53387e2cdc2e578e93faa6d87cae42db
content:
Loved persona 5 and its royal version. However this game is literally unplayable for me. I can't seem to get a stable 60 fps while in game, it seems a lot of people have this issue too, something to do with having 6 - 8 threads on your cpu. There seems to be some sort of fix but I've tried everything and the game at max plays at 41 fps. 

Actually saddened and never thought I'd have to refund a game, specially a Persona one but here we are. It's been 1 year and this hasn't been fixed. Most likely it never will. If you have a medium rig, sure, buy it and try it out. If you have a powerful rig, don't waste your time on this game.

Edit: Who are the two fanboys who put the "jester" award on every negative review lol

author: 8afeade4101f58ee97415c74e4ad572b
content:
严重掉帧处理办法：
发现一些玩家和我一样，都是高配电脑严重掉帧，
基本原因是win10系统对12代处理器不兼容导致大核心不工作，小核心负担不起游戏。
解决办法为关闭CPU小核心即可，亲测有效，从卡成PPT变得无比流畅。
个人电脑也是win10+i7-12700kf，所以这是win10系统的处理办法，如果是win11的话就不知道了，毕竟没有试过

author: 6b7c6e57cb355f25afd404fcd7194867
content:
8/10

This game is great! The gameplay is fantastic and the transition from turn-based JRPG to more of a hack-and-slash á Dynasty Warriors works wonders. The game is only held back by a mediocre story, but what else could you expect when you shoehorn in a sequel/spinoff to such a great game as Persona 5?

You need to play Persona 5 before this. You will miss out on A LOT, otherwise. The game is set after Persona 5 and the gang is having a reunion. Hoogle Boogle, new threat to the world is coming. You and your gang has to go on a road-trip around Japan to stop the metaverse from taking over. The gameplay is now fast-paced hack-and-slash with some small stealth-elements sprinked in. The social links from Persona 3-5 are gone, you already have built relations with your teammates. The game is long, the story ranging from 30-40 hours, depending on what difficulty-setting you are playing on, and there are a lot of sidequests to do that give decent rewards.

Now what is really good and bad about the game? Well, let me tell you:

+ Fun and fast-paced combat. Works surprisingly well and feels natural when cosidering how mechanics from Persona 5 has transitioned into this game.
+ A lot of content for a spin-off.
+ Visuals and voice-acting performance. The game looks great and sounds even greater.

- The story is very predictable and repetitive. The story also fails to handle how the new threat makes sense (in the context of the game) and it even makes constant remarks that "the metaverse works in mysterious ways" in order to explain changes. Feels a little lazy or just hastilly handled.
-- (extreme nitpick) Getting all of the achievements requires a lot of grinding. Not something you want to do for an achievement.

Great game otherwise, get it and preferably play it with a controller. It worked wonders!

author: e48de996173c5672a35d4b10e065e0ff
content:
本作是女神异闻录5的续作，故事发生在无印版结局（没有丸喜芳泽和第三学期）之后的暑假里的故事，建议在打完p5后再游玩本作，体验更好。
在打完p5r之后意犹未尽，难受了好几天，最后入了p5s。本来我的想法是只要能看到我的伙伴们就满足了，不管游戏怎么样。不过在入手体验了之后发现游戏还是很不错的，特别是作为一个后日谈，超出了我的预料，就是价格偏高。
游戏将p5那种自己安排时间的游戏方式改成了传统线性的游戏方式，并且战斗外包给了光荣脱裤魔，由回合制改成了即时战斗，但是仍然保留了原作的很多设定，玩起来还是很有p5的感觉的。在高难度下难度很高不过最低难度还是可以的，一般来说通关应该还是比较容易的。然后就是面具合成的变化也非常大，基本上就是一条线，也少了很多面具，变动很多。
当时打完p5r感觉很遗憾，还记得玩p4g的时候经常出去玩很快乐，但是在p5r中这种内容少了很多，感谢p5s圆了我的梦。和我的挚友们在日本各地旅游，学食谱，做料理，买伴手礼，很快乐。同时化作心之怪盗团，惩恶扬善，很感慨已经成长了这么多。也回忆了当时的日子，同时复刻了很多经典，同时也新产生了很多快乐的回忆，经常玩着玩着就笑起来了。剧情方面也很不错，新加的人物很不错，同时也丰满了原来人物的形象，加强了人物的塑造。特别是奥村春，由于原作出场很晚，导致塑造过少，在p5s里让我更加了解了这个温柔并且坚强还有点腹黑的女孩。可惜很多coop人物都没有见到，大多只是提一下，甚至有的都没提。
游戏本身质量还是可以的，就是价格偏高，如果打完p5r之后觉得意犹未尽的非常推荐购买。

author: 8af983c6419f53bd838c34c4906af44d
content:
As someone who finished the OG P5 game on PS4 twice, and Royal 3 times, it should say a good bit when I tell you I didnt even get halfway through this game.

Highest difficulty:
If you arent constantly keeping your allies fed with an endless supply of xp sourced from fodder battles, a few enemies have aoe attacks that they make absolutely no effort to avoid, and die instantly as a result. This means if you arent spending what I can only assume is 3x the intended time in any given area (due to the enemy variety and lack of anything interesting happening while you mindlessly beat fodder to death for hours) your team gets smoked immediately (and i do mean i m m e d i a t e l y) and youre left to either dodge perfectly doing one person's damage on an enemy with hp scaled for 4 attackers for 10 minutes or spam gun attacks from across the map, which takes longer, but not enough longer than its worth dying even once while doing the more entertaining gameplay style.

Anything lower than the highest difficulty:
Spam any button and win every fight without even the slightest effort.

By the time I was frustrated enough fighting using only my gun from max range and swapped down a tick and realised this, I was too burnt out to continue. The conversations are entertaining enough, but only just enough, to make me consider picking it back up once I forget the torments of the combat in a few years.

If you really really really care about having more P5 interactions from ONLY the main cast (no one from royal, and no side confidants) save yourself the effort, play on the easiest difficulty and sprint through every combat section without deviating at all from the main story route.
Just another classic Persona spinoff side hustle with the bare minimum effort put in to milk enough money for the next, sure to be just as amazing as 4 and 5, mainline Persona title.

author: 122554fd338c593c8135b5d453cc1f05
content:
P5S，又名《买菜做菜异闻录》《异常状态异闻录》

个人只打了一周目，觉得P5S的战斗做得还是挺不错的，把无双那一套系统和persona那一套系统融合的挺好的，每个角色的动作系统都各有特色，技能部分又都保留了本传的特点。但数值设计的不太好，C技的伤害太低了，不破盾又没有硬直，导致C技的使用非常不安全，在有压力的战斗中这套动作系统存在感很薄弱了，还是得用persona本传的那套技能打week和technical的思路。频繁的使用技能又导致SP值很吃紧，尤其是第一个boss还不能做料理的情况下，一周目新玩家多数不会提前准备大量的SP药，就比较折磨。另外P5S战斗中不能随时切换队友，遇到不能打属性针对的情况会比较难受

剧情方面，个人是很喜欢P5S的剧情风格的，这种公路片式的结构，更欢乐的日常事件，把本传缺乏的团体活动都给补上了，经典的烟火大会、沙滩游泳、温泉“偷窥”、集体做饭等情节，很温馨也很欢乐。boss故事的描写相对套路一些，但各个监狱都算是各有特色，整个故事体验相当良好。索菲亚和善吉的描写也下了功夫，比芳泽和明智的进团自然多了

音乐方面单体夸一下，在本传的音乐里融入了无双系的风格，添加了摇滚的风味，更适合动作游戏的爽快感，无论是游戏里还是单独听都不输本传的音乐

整体还是相当不错的，一段快乐的暑假之旅，喜欢本传的玩家都推荐来玩玩P5S

author: 1b352a258b1c579097984364d92bd200
content:
（说在前面：建议玩过P5作品的玩家再来购入，更能增添游玩的乐趣。配合P5R一起食用也是可以的，就是少了丸喜和学妹）
作为一部P5后日谈作品，总体下来是符合预期的。1more、换手等战斗内容便捷化，show time和总共击也更符合动作内容。凹p的简化，也方便了战斗。新加入的苏菲亚也很可爱，尤其是苏菲亚商店的UI，是继妙妙的药店之后我最喜欢的。相较后续出的P5R版本中的学妹，我认为苏菲亚的剧情和人设要更胜一筹（虽然我也喜欢学妹）。
！问题是游戏内“监狱”的战斗和任务设置有点繁琐，一个任务点要反复来回折腾，有些场景道具与战斗交互还是有些欠缺。
虽然有些小问题，但能够看到这群朋友在一起拌嘴聊天，吵吵闹闹，不就够了吗？也正因为他们之间的友情、羁绊，让我深深地喜欢上了这个游戏。同时P5S也继承了前作丰富的文戏，并在此基础上深挖了主角们的人物，“反派”的人物也映射了每一个人的曾经，丰满了整个游戏的故事性。
希望大家都能沉浸到这个夏天的故事中，它一定会给你留下珍贵的回忆。

author: acb2f72f818859989a888089bdf0954f
content:
剧情方面：我的评价是低开高走。前三个监狱剧情白开水（其实这3个故事也是能看到怪盗团成员的成长的，但是我完全能理解先入P5S的可能会觉得很无聊），玩过P5的估计问题不大，没玩过的估计很难坚持到后面。过了前三个剧情之后后期就是一路走高了，有本篇水准（指主线），原汁原味（除去COOP支线部分），玩过P5R/P5的还是非常推荐的，专治怅然若失意犹未尽心被P5结局偷走的症状。
战斗方面：别想当无双玩，除非EASY难度。普通难度也要学会打弱点和组合技，还要凹凹P才能不折磨，只想看看怪盗团成员再聚后续的建议EASY算了。熟练战斗模式之后还挺有意思的，就是一周目就算一直线上购物加做烹饪材料请求加顺路买街上东西加经常做SP回复烹饪也还是缺蓝……，然后场地要素利用率还是蛮高的，虽然主要来回就是跳下来转圈/砸灯/发射/开车四种，但是个人还是觉得蛮有战斗体验的，而且这作打起来是真的帅，只要稍稍了解每个角色的一些小技巧就能轻易打出花里胡哨的连招，然后被BOSS一脚踢飞在半空中（并不是。
其他：优化的话只能说日厂移植里面不算差，但是肯定也说不上好，自己体会吧。UI也是原汁原味的酷炫，装备系统有点简陋了，尤其饰品，面具相关养成也是简化版的，因为篇幅这点完全能理解，但是一周目正常进度根本合不出70多级以上的那些面具就通关了吧！
以上，这游戏给P5粉丝的体验前期7到7.5，中期开始8.5分吧，剧情桥段部分9分（本篇人设全部维持不说，新加的角色刻画也都很丰满）。
 没玩过前作的并不是很推荐，起码不像P5R那么推荐，但是也可以考虑试一试，最推荐的顺序肯定还是P5R-P5S（虽然P5S结局是接P5而不是皇家版的，但是这不重要）。

通关后记
也是无双老玩家了，gba时代就开始接触了。从真三国无双、塞尔达无双、火纹无双到这作p5s，不得不说这一部作品是玩过的无双里质量最高之一，剧情、迷宫设计、人设/画面/音乐（延续）、游戏机制、玩法上的设计都水平在线，不说顶尖也是非常出色的。
尤其对于p5/p5r的玩家来说，是非常棒的后日谈作品，说它是给p5粉丝的礼物，也是再确切不过了，强烈推荐，因为和p5本传的玩法不一样，上手可能会不太习惯，但是若能耐着性子玩下去，相信会觉得物超所值的。
最后，怪盗团，后会有期。
